Business Description: 3rd Rock Multimedia Limited is an India-based event management company. The Company conducts film promotions, international events, corporate events and cultural events. The Company's entertainment properties include 3rd Rock Fashion Fiesta and 3rd Rock Calendar. The Company's association with various events in Mumbai includes Bryan Adam's Live in Concert, Michael Learns to Rock (MLTR) Eternity Concert, 3rd Rock's Calendar Launch 2011-2012, Airtel I Phone 4 Launch and ISPL Cricket Tournament 2012.

The Andhra Petrochemicals Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in the manufacturing of oxo-alcohols. The Company's products/services include 2 Ethyl Hexanol and Butanols. It offers Normal Butanol and Iso Butanol. Its 2 Ethyl Hexanol has applications in plasticizers, stabilizers, solvents, acrylates and finishing compounds for ink. Other applications of 2 Ethyl Hexanol include nitrate esters, lube and fuel additives, surfactants, mining, stabilizers, solvent extractions, oil flotations, agricultural chemicals and engine machinery lubrication. Its facilities include steam generation, diesel power generation, sea water cooling tower and raw water storage. The Company's plant is located in Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh.

Force Motors Limited is a holding company. The Company is engaged in manufacturing light commercial vehicles and utility vehicles, and engines. It is an automobile company, with a focus on design, development and manufacture of a range of automotive components, aggregates and vehicles. Its product range includes Small Commercial Vehicles, Multi-Utility Vehicles (MUV), Light Commercial Vehicles (LCV), Sports Utility Vehicles (SUV) and Agricultural Tractors. Its personal vehicles include Force Gurkha and Force One. Its Commercial vehicles include Passenger Carrier, such as Trax GAMA, Trax Cruiser, Trax Toofan and Trax Cruiser, and Goods Carrier, such as Trump 40, Trump 40 Hi-Deck, Trax Delivery Van, Traveller Delivery Van and Trax Kargo-King. Its Agricultural Vehicles include Balwan and Orchard. It also offers Traveller Super with approximately 1.8 meter width, and the Traveller Royale with over 2.2 meter width, with various configurations and seating capacities.

Diamines and Chemicals Limited is a holding company. The Company is engaged in the manufacture of organic chemicals compounds and is also involved in electric power generation using other non-conventional sources (Windmill). It operates through two segments: Speciality Chemicals and Power Generation. The Company manufactures a range of Ethylene Amines in India. The Ethylene Amines products are used in various industry segments, such as pharmaceuticals, agro-chemicals, resin and coating, water treatment chemicals and oilfield chemicals. Its products include Piperazine Anhydrous, Piperazine 68% (PIP-68), Ethylenediamine (EDA), Diethylenetriamine (DETA), Amino Ethyl Piperazine (AEP), Polyamines Mix (PA MIX), Monoethanolamine (MEA), Triethylenediamine (100%), Triethylenediamine (33% in Propylene Glycol (PG)), Triethylenediamine (33% in Dipropylene Glycol (DPG)), Triethylenediamine (33% in Ethylene Glycol (MEG)) and Acid Corrosion Inhibitor (ACI).

Insilco Limited is engaged in manufacturing and selling of precipitated silica. The Company produces various grades of precipitated silica, catering to the requirements of customers in various industries. Its products include SIPERNAT 22, SIPERNAT 22 S, SIDENT 22 S, ULTRASIL VN 3, ULTRASIL VN 3 GR and ULTRASIL 7000 GR. SIPERNAT 22 is used as carrier silica for choline chloride solutions, vitamin E acetate and other liquid active substances. SIPERNAT 22 S is used as a carrier in solid formulations, such as wettable powders (WP) and water-dispersible granules (WG). SIDENT 22 S is a fine particle silica. Ultrasil VN 3 manages rubber mixtures in terms of shore hardness, tensile strength, tear resistance and abrasion resistance. ULTRASIL 7000 GR is a mechanically compacted granulate. Its rubber applications include tire, footwear and mechanical rubber goods. Its specialty applications include agrochemicals, feed, food, toothpaste, detergents, battery separators, cosmetics and defoamer.

Integrated Financial Services Limited is an India-based non-banking finance company (NBFC). The Company is engaged in the business of investment activities. The Company's activities consist of investing in long-term investments in equity shares and equity-related securities of companies in a range of industries.

Ion Exchange (India) Limited is engaged in water and environment management business. The Company offers products, including ion exchange resins, water treatment plants and chemical additives. The Company's segments are Engineering, Chemicals and Consumer Products. It focuses on industrial water and wastewater treatment. Its Engineering segment consists of water treatment plants, spares and services in connection with the plants. In the Engineering segment, the Company designs, engineers, builds and maintains medium and large sized water and wastewater treatment plants, including recycling and zero liquid discharge plants. The Chemicals segment consists of resins, water treatment chemicals, sugar chemicals and paper chemicals. Its Consumer Products segment consists of domestic water purifiers. The Company offers its water and environment management solutions to various sectors, including infrastructure, industrial, institutional, municipal, home and communities, and urban and rural.

Kinetic Engineering Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in the manufacturing of auto components. The Company manufactures transmission components, such as gears, shafts and axles; engine components, such as crankshafts, cylinder heads and camshafts; complete gearbox, and engine assemblies for auto and non-auto products. It performs a range of machining operations on metal forgings, aluminum castings and iron castings. It provides solutions, which includes press shop, including activities, such as forming, bending, trimming, drawing and piercing; weld shop, including spot welding, seam welding, gas welding, projection welding, tig welding, aluminum welding and laser welding, and paint shop and plating, which includes paint shop with pre-treatment plant, including degreasing, chromatizing and phospating, as well as cathodic electric deposition (CED) painting for components, such as chassis and rims. The Company's plant is located in Ahmednagar, Maharashtra.

Lords Chloro Alkali Limited is engaged in manufacturing of caustic soda, liquid chlorine, stable bleaching powder (SBP), hydrochloric acid, bleach liquor, trichloroethylene (TCE) and hydrogen gas. The Company supplies its products to paper, soap, dyes, chemicals and plastic industries based at the western part of Uttar Pradesh, Haryana, Punjab and Delhi. Its manufacturing facilities are located at Alwar (Rajasthan). The Company runs its plant at 107 tons per day (TPD) during the year. Its caustic Soda (Lye) is supplied in lorry tankers and packaged in mild steel (MS) drums, and caustic soda flakes are marketed in 50-kilogram high-density polyethylene (HDPE) bags. Its SBP is packed in laminated High Density Polyethylene (HDPE) Bags with liner of 25-kilogram and 50-kilogram capacity and in galvanized iron (GI) drums with liner of 50-kilogram capacity.

National Peroxide Limited is a manufacturer of hydrogen peroxide, sodium perborate, compressed hydrogen gas and per acetic acid. The Company operates through two divisions: manufacturing of peroxygens and hydrogen gas, and others, which consists of investing activities. The Company manufactures hydrogen peroxide with an installed capacity of approximately 95,000 metric tons per annum (MTPA) on 50% weight per weight (w/w). basis. The Company manufactures hydrogen peroxide in approximately four different forms, which include 50% w/w (Concentrated), 60% w/w (Concentrated), 35% w/w (Concentrated) and 70% w/w (Distillate). The Company's integrated manufacturing site for hydrogen peroxide is located at Kalyan in Maharashtra (India). The Company's subsidiary is Naperol Investments Limited.

Punjab Communications Limited is engaged in manufacturing of telecommunication products. The Company is a manufacturer and supplier of telecommunication and information technology (IT) equipment and solutions in India. Its product range includes voice/data multiplexers, power plants, optical/transmission equipment, digital radios, power line carrier communication (PLCC), broadband equipment and services. It offers transmission products, radio products and switching products. Its transmission products include VMUX and synchronous digital hierarchy (SDH). Its switching products include versatile switching system (VSS 2100), 256 port RAX, 256 port EPABX, SBM RAX, remote switching unit, MAX-L and MAX-XL. It offers services, such as turnkey projects and contract manufacturing. The Company operates a switched-mode power supply (SMPS) power plant. Its consultancy services include technology domains, such as hardware, software, networking and Internet.

Rubfila International Limited is engaged in the manufacture and sale of heat resistant latex rubber thread (HRLRT). The Company's geographic segments include Outside India, which includes sales in export market, such as Asia, Europe, Africa and America, Within India, which includes sales in domestic market. It manufactures Talcum Coated and Silicon Coated Rubber threads. It produces threads with sizes ranging from 3.1 millimeters (8 count) diameter to 0.23 millimeters (110 count) diameter. Its products include colored rubber threads, furniture grade rubber thread, rubber threads for medical applications, rubber thread for food/meat packing, rubber thread for catheter making and rubber threads in bobbins. It produces rubber threads for various applications, such as apparel, food grade, furniture Webbing, bungee jumping, toys, medical netting, diapers, fishing, meat packing and medical Webbing. Its plant is located at New Industrial Development Area, Kanjikode, Palakkad, Kerala.

UTL Industries Ltd is a India-based steel trader. The Company services span every step in the steel supply chain and include finance, provision of raw materials, steel trading, distribution and stockholding. The Company acts as a trading intermediary between producers and purchasers providing range of value-adding services. The Company's goods which are traded include long, flat, tubular and semi-finished products. The Company also trades specialized products such as engineering steels, stainless steels and steel products for the oil & gas industry.

Hindustan Organic Chemicals Limited (HOCL) is an India-based company engaged in the manufacture and sale of chemicals. The Company's products include Phenol, Acetone, Oleum, Nitrobenzene, Concentrated Nitric Acid (CNA), Aniline, Nitrotoluenes, Chlorobenzenes, Nitrochlorobenzenes, Dinitrogen Tetroxide (N2O4) and Hydrogen Peroxide (H2O2). It provides various organic chemicals for industries, such as resins and laminates, dyes and dyes intermediates, drugs and pharmaceuticals, rubber chemicals, paints, pesticides and others. It also produces plastic polytetrafluoroethylene (PTFE) through its subsidiary. HOCL uses raw materials, such as benzene, toluene, liquefied petroleum gas (LPG), methanol, naphtha and sulfur. HOCL has two manufacturing units at Rasayani, District Raigad in Maharashtra and at Kochi in Kerala. The Company's subsidiary, Hindustan Fluorocarbons Limited, has a manufacturing unit located in Hyderabad.

MPIL Corporation Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in providing business support services and leasing. The Company is engaged in exploring various avenues with a focus on opportunities arising out of changes in foreign direct investment (FDI) norms in retail and various sectors. The Company was engaged in activities relating to design, development, and installation and servicing of textile and food machinery, among others. The Company is a subsidiary of Jumbo Investments Limited. Jumbo World Holdings Limited is the ultimate holding company of the Company.

Garware Polyester Limited is an exporter of polyester films. The Company also manufactures sun control window films. It manufactures bi-axially oriented polyethylene terephthalate (BOPET)/polyester films, sun control films, biaxially oriented polypropylene (BOPP) films, thermal lamination films and specialty polyester films. It manufactures window films for applications, such as automotive, architectural, safety and anti-graffiti. It offers infrared rejection films and films to reduce the impact of mobile tower radiation. It also manufactures heat rejection films. In addition, it offers products, which include digital printable films, films for solar photo voltaic application, films for lidding application, coated films for label, and medium and high shrink films for label. The Company, through its step down subsidiary, Global Pet Films Inc., markets brands, such as GLOBAL WINDOW FILMS and Garware Sun Control. It sells its products in China, Europe, Australia and Africa, among others.

Oscar Investments Limited is a non-banking finance company. The Company is engaged in the business of income from financial activity. The Company focuses on the business of an investment company, finances industrial enterprise, and promotes companies engaged in industrial and trading business. The Company has a subsidiary Shimal Research Laboratories Limited and a sub-subsidiary, Fortis Clinical Research Limited. Fortis Clinical Research Limited is engaged in the business of conducting bio-equivalence research in India.

The Industrial and Prudential Investment Company Limited is a Non-Banking Financial Company (NBFC) engaged in dealing in investments and securities. The Company is engaged in acquisition of securities. The Company operates through Investment Activity segment. The Company's subsidiary is New Holding And Trading Company Limited. The Company operates in India.

Triveni Glass Limited is engaged in the manufacture of glass. The Company operates approximately two plants at Rajahmundry manufacturing clear and colored figured (patterned) glass in over 25 designs (patterns) and approximately seven tints. Its products can have the photographs of the various designs, colors classified in various pages for designs that are exclusive, popular, evergreen designs, international and tints. The Company exports its products to various countries, such as Italy, France, Morocco, Tunisia, Algeria, South Africa, Australia, Egypt, Sudan, Madagascar, Mauritius, Nigeria, Ghana, Zimbabwe, Yemen, Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore, Sri Lanka, Bangladesh, Oman, Bahrain and Kuwait, among others. The Company operates in India and Out of India.

Wagend Infra Venture Limited is an India-based company, which is primarily engaged in the investing activities. The Company is engaged in the business of construction of roads and railways. The Company focuses on exploring opportunities in the infrastructure sector.

Jyoti Limited is engaged in the manufacture of electric motors, generators, switchgears and relays, among others. The Company is engaged in manufacturing of engineering goods, and manufactures and markets a range of electrical and hydraulic engineering equipment. Its products and services include Engineered Pumps & Projects; Hydel; Rotating Electrical Machine; Switchgear, and Electronics & Control System. Its Engineered Pumps & Projects product range includes Vertical Turbine Pump, Vertical Mixed Flow Pump, Metallic Volute Pumps, Vertical Propeller Pump, Horizontal split casing pump, Vertical Non Clog Centrifugal-Pump VNC and Horizontal Non Clog Centrifugal Pump NC. Its Hydel products include turbines, inlet valves and hydro generators. Its Rotating Electrical Machine product line includes motors, alternators, wind energy generators, frequency convertors and induction generators. Its other products include vacuum circuit breakers (indoor) and busbars.

Kaycee Industries Limited is engaged in the manufacturing of switches and counters. The Company's segments include Switches, Counters and Others. It is engaged in manufacturing and trading of industrial switches, counters, water meters and electrical components. The Company's switches include Rotary Switches, Micro Switches, Micro Switch k1, Micro Switch k3, Micro Switch k4/k7, Micro Switch k5/k8, Toggle Switches, Changeover Switch, Foot Switch, Limit Switches and New Limit Switch. Its Counters include Stroke Counter, Senior Revolution, Measuring Machine, Road Measure, Impulse Counter, Digital Counter, Digicount and Universal Counter. Its Meters include Water Meters, Domestic Water Meters, Woltman Water Meters, Single Jet Meters, Batch Meters and Panel Meter. It also offers Relays & Buzzers, Temperature controllers, push button lamps, fuse fitting, cable lugs and rotary toggle. Its Relays & Buzzers include Timers & Protection Relays, Delay on Timer, and Multifunction & Range Timer.

Panasonic Energy India Company Limited is engaged in the manufacturing and supplying of dry cell batteries and lighting products. The Company's products include zinc carbon batteries, alkaline batteries, torches and rechargeable batteries. It offers zinc carbon batteries under a range of models, including Panasonic Gold, Panasonic Hyper, Panasonic Novino Raja, Panasonic Jumbo, Panasonic Ultimate, Panasonic Gold Plus and others. Its Panasonic Alkaline batteries are suitable for use in shavers, toys, digital cameras, remote controls, instruments and security systems. The Company markets and sells rechargeable batteries and chargers under the eneloop brand. It offers torches under various models, including NOVINO POWERLITE, NOVINO GLOWLITE, NOVINO SUPERLITE, NOVINO VIRAT and others. It has approximately two manufacturing plants, which are located in Vadodara, Gujarat, and Pithampur, Madhya Pradesh. The Company is a part of Panasonic Corporation.

High Energy Batteries (India) Limited is an India-based manufacturer of batteries. The Company operates through two segments: AeroSpace, Naval, and Power System Batteries, and Lead Acid Storage Batteries. The Company's principal products include aerospace, naval and power system batteries silver zinc, silver chloride magnesium and nickel cadmium batteries, and lead acid storage batteries. The Company offers aircraft batteries, torpedo batteries, missiles batteries and helicopter batteries for defense; motorcycle batteries; car batteries and truck batteries; valve-regulated lead-acid (VRLA) batteries, and tubular batteries. The Company's hi-tech batteries are used in army, navy, airforce and launch vehicles and its commercial batteries are used for auto and standby VRLA applications. The Company's batteries are used for various applications, such as underwater propulsion, control guidance, communication, emergency starting and aerospace.

Delton Cables Limited is engaged in manufacturing and supplying of wires and cables. The Company also manufactures switchgears. The Company operates through two segments: wire & cables and switchgear products. The Company offers polyvinyl chloride (PVC) wires and cables. It offers products under categories, such as wires and cables, including Power & Control Cables, House Wire, Indoor Telephone Cables, Instrumentation Cables, High Temperature Cables, Compensating Cables, Zero Halogen Cables, Single Core Wires, Polyurethane sheathed Cables and Cables for Railway application; switchgear, including On load Changeover Switch, Load Break Changeover Switch, By Pass Changeover Switch, Isolator and Off Load Changeover Switch, and distribution boards, including Single Four Pole Enclosure, and Plug & Socket Distribution Board. The Company supplies its products to the power, telecommunication, railways, steel and mining sectors in India. The Company also supplies to the international market.
Modulex Construction Technologies Limited is an India-based offsite modular construction company. The Company has over 200,000 square meters of steel modular manufacturing facility.

Ravindra Energy Limited, formerly Ravindra Trading and Agencies Limited, is an India-based holding company. The Company is principally engaged in Trading Coal, Trading Sugar and Solar Pumps. The Company offers solar rooftop solutions on an Engineering, Procurement and Construction (EPC) and Build-Operate-Own-Transfer (BOOT) basis. It is also engaged in utility solar business. The Company offers installations, including pump installation, rooftops installation and ground mount installation. The Company is engaged in the installation of solar systems for water pumping; sale of electricity, and consultancy. The Company's subsidiaries include Vantamuri Trading and Investments Limited, Nandur Sugars Limited, Agri Venture Trading and Investment Private Limited, Renuka Energy Resource Holdings and Mineracao Elefante Ltda.

Galada Power and Telecommunication Limited is engaged in the business of manufacturing aluminum conductors and other allied products. The Company is also engaged in the manufacturing manufacture and marketing of aluminum and aluminum alloy wire-rods (electrical/mechanical); conductors manufacture and marketing of overhead ECs, and consultancy, construction/erection, inspection and commissioning of transmission and distribution lines and sub-stations from 11 Kilovolt (kV) to 220 kV. The Company's products EC aluminum wire rods, all aluminum alloy conductors (AAAC), all aluminum conductors (AAC), aluminum alloy conductors steel reinforced (AACSR), aluminum conductor steel reinforced (ACSR), special/development conductors, specialty rods/wires for electrical applications, specialty wires for mechanical applications and special purpose machines. The Company also provides uprating and upgrading of existing transmission and distribution lines of all voltage levels.

Investment & Precision Castings Limited is a holding company. The Company is engaged in steel castings business. It offers products for automotive, pumps and valves, electrical and instrumentation, and general engineering. It supplies a range of machined and ready-for-use investment cast parts to the automotive industry, including transmission parts, engine parts, clutch parts, parts for turbo-chargers and exhaust gas recirculation cooler parts. For the valve industry, the Company supplies a range of castings, such as valve bodies, gate valve wedges, globe valve discs and butterfly valve discs. Its electrical and instrumentation products include heavy duty electrical switch gears, parts for piping and flow measuring instruments, and parts for pressure transducers. Its general engineering products include stream turbine blades, components for the pneumatic industry, general machinery parts, parts for agricultural machinery, parts for machine tools and parts for printing machinery.

Duncan Engineering Limited, formerly Schrader Duncan Limited, is a manufacturer and trader of tire tube valves and accessories, fluid power and automation products. The Company's segments are Automotive Tyres Valves & Accessories, and Fluid Power & Automation. The Fluid Power & Automation segment consists of pneumatic equipment and hydraulic products. Its fluid power and automation category consists of products, including pneumatic cylinders, hydraulic cylinders, pneumatic valves, air preparation units, positioners, pneumatic rotary actuators, tubing and fittings, pneumatic automation systems, valve automation systems and modular piping system. Its automotive category consists of products, including tire tube valves, such as passenger car valves; valve accessories, such as valve cores; valve extensions, such as mold tube connectors; garage and in-plant service, such as air chucks, and tubeless tire valves. Its manufacturing unit is located at Ranjangaon.

Company: Stewarts and Lloyds of India Ltd
Business Description: Stewarts and Lloyds of India Limited is engaged in execution of erection projects in India, which, in most cases involve supply of materials (procured or manufactured). The Company is involved in project management and construction in various projects sites and fabrication of structural materials. The project and construction services business deal with overall project management, design and engineering, procurement of bought-out items, fabrication and erection of pipes and equipment at various sites, including civil, structural, electrical and instrumentation. The Company operates erection sites and offers site fabrication, erection and commissioning of industrial pipe work and accessories, and also the mechanical erection of process plant equipment. The Company provides engineering and construction services to various sectors, including metal, power and fertilizer. IOT Infrastructure & Energy Services Ltd is the Company's holding company.

Automobile Corporation of Goa Limited is engaged in the manufacture of pressed parts, components, sub-assemblies for various range of automobiles and manufacture of bus bodies and component parts thereof. The Company operates through two segments: Pressing Division and Bus body Building Division. The Pressing Division segment is engaged in the manufacture of pressed parts, components, sub-assemblies and assemblies. The Bus body Building Division segment is engaged in the manufacturing of bus bodies and component parts for bus bodies. The Company's products include staff transport application buses, luxury application buses, city application buses, defense application buses, airport application buses, school application buses, sleeper buses, special application vehicles and sheet metal products. The Company manufactures sheet metal components, assemblies and bus coaches at its factories situated at villages Honda and Bhuimpal, Goa.

Z F Steering Gear (India) Limited is engaged in the business of production and assembling of steering systems for vehicles, buses and tractors. The Company is principally engaged in the manufacturing of auto component (steering gear) and renewable energy (solar and wind power). The Company's segments include Auto Component and Renewable Energy. The Company's product range includes steering systems, vane pumps, pump pulleys, oil reservoirs, steering & pump mounting brackets, steering columns, intermediate shafts, universal joints, bevel gears boxes and power steering oil dexron II. The Company's five mega-watt (MW) solar power project is located at Gujarat Solar Park. The Company operates approximately seven wind turbine machines, which are located in districts of Satara and Ahmednagar, which have an aggregated capacity of approximately 6.7 megawatts. The Company has plant at Vadu Budruk, near Pune for production and assembling of steering systems and accessories.

Skyline Millars Limited is an India-based company engaged in the activities pertaining to construction equipment, real estate and pre-cast pipes. The Company operates through three segments: Construction Equipment, Pre Cast Pipes and Real Estate Development. The Construction Equipment segment is engaged in equipment and spares sales, repair, installation and servicing of equipment. The Pre Cast Pipes segment is engaged in manufacturing other non-metallic mineral (R.C.C.) products. The Real Estate Development segment is engaged in the construction of buildings. Its real estate development projects include Skyline Oasis and the Riverside Project. The Skyline Oasis includes an area of approximately 800,000 Square feet residential development. The Riverside Project is located at Karjat.

HIM Teknoforge Ltd, formerly Gujarat Automotive Gears Limited, is an India-based company, which is engaged in the manufacture of parts and accessories for motor vehicles. The Company's geographical segments include USA, Europe, Gulf Countries and Others (Domestic). The Company's auto and tractor components are marketed under the KAG brand name. The Company's products serve the aftermarket and original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) in India and abroad. The Company's products include transmission gears, such as helical spur gears and Z-F transmission; pins, such as king pins, spring pins and shackle pins; axle shaft for tractor, truck and light commercial (LCV) applications; propeller shaft components, such as yoke and teeth, universal joint cross and cross holders; wheel spanners for trucks; fork-lift parts, and off-road parts.

International Combustion (India) Limited is engaged in the manufacture of heavy engineering equipment; geared motors and gear boxes, and dry mix products. The Company's segments include Mineral & Material Processing & Handling Equipment, and Geared Motor and Gear Box. Handling Equipment includes mineral, material processing and other handling equipment. Its Geared motors include gear box, geared motor drive system. It offers a range of products, such as vibrating screens and feeders, cone crushers, bulk material handling equipment, mining haulages, Raymond grinding mills, air classifiers and flash drying systems and geared motors and gear boxes. Its manufacturing facilities are located at Kolkata, Nagpur and Aurangabad. Its Building Material Division is located at Ajmer, Rajasthan, for manufacture of dry mix mortar/dry mix products and related building materials, which it focuses on manufacturing under IC Preciplast, IC PreciJoint, IC Precigrout, IC Preciseal and IC Precifix brands.

Mangal Credit & Fincorp Limited (MCFL) is a holding company. The Company is a non-banking financial company (NBFC), which is primarily engaged in rendering loans services. The Company's segments include Finance, Construction, Marbles, Renting of Movable Assets, Broking and Others. The Company offers services, including loans and credit facilities, private educational funding, and trade in money market under writing stocks and shares. The Company’s subsidiaries include Mangal Buildhome Pvt. Ltd., Mangal Compusolutions Pvt. Ltd., Satco Capital Markets Limited, INDTrans Container Lines Pvt. Ltd., Mangal Global Marbles Pvt Ltd. and Mangal Mining & Minerals Pvt Ltd.

Hindustan Hardy Ltd, formerly Hindustan Hardy Spicer Limited, is an India-based company engaged in the business of designing and manufacturing of propeller shafts and other accessories required for automotive, industrial and other applications. The Company's products include propeller shaft, UJ kit double cardan shafts and components, hubs, door hinges and vibration dampers. It operates through the propeller shafts and components segment. Its secondary segments are Domestic and Export. The Company offers propeller shafts, including SAE series 1100 to 1700. Its propeller shafts and UJ kits are applicable in vibrating screens, steel mills, printing machinery, backhoe loader, telehandler, excavators, tractors, utility vehicles and harvester. It also offers lay shafts, half end yokes and precision machined components. Its double cardan shafts are applicable for front wheel drive applications. It offers hinges, and hubs and vibration dampers for utility vehicles.

Triton Valves Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in the design, manufacture and sale of automotive tire and tube valves, cores and accessories. The Company's segments are domestic and export. It is an original equipment (OE) supplier to both tire and automobile industries. It offers valves, which include bicycle valves, moped valves, motor cycle valves, scooter valves, car and van valves, truck and bus valves, tractor valves, industrial vehicle valves, aircraft, curing bag valves and over the road (OTR) valves. The Company offers accessories, which include valve cap, bridge washer, ring washer, rim nuts, hex nuts, lock nuts, rubber washer, rubber base and bush. Its offerings in cores include standard bore and large bore. In addition, the Company offers adapters and plugs, service tools and air conditioning products. The Company's valves and cores are used in tires of all sizes of vehicles from motorcycles and scooters to heavy-duty trucks and aircrafts.

JRI Industries & Infrastructure Limited is an India-based company engaged in the construction activities. The Company is engaged in the infrastructure development activities. The Company's principal activities include construction and building, and miscellaneous commercial. The Company is focusing to explore and develop opportunities in the infrastructure sector.
Arihant Multi Commercial Limited is an India-based company. The Company operates in two business segments: Finance and Investment Activities, and Textiles Activities.

Intellivate Capital Ventures Limited is engaged in management consultancy activities. The Company is engaged in offering advisory services on several financial and corporate issues. The Company is also engaged in investment services and trading in shares. The Company's financial advisory services include acquisition and mergers. The Company, on behalf of its clients, identifies business enterprises that can be candidates for takeover. The Company also advises clients on mergers of businesses, considering various aspects of transaction, including due diligence, taxation and stamp duty impact, relative valuation and the legal procedure involved. It works with corporates on raising funds through capital markets either through an initial public offering (IPO) or a follow-on public offer (FPO) route. The Company caters to various industries, including consumer, healthcare, pharmaceuticals, technology, media and entertainment, and financial services.

Amines and Plasticizers Limited is engaged in the manufacturing of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastic and synthetic rubber in primary forms. The Company's geographical segments include India and Out of India. The Company is engaged in the production of alkyl alkonalamines, morpholine, alkyl morpholine and gas treating solvents, which finds application in various industries, such as oil refineries, natural gas plants, ammonia plants, petrochemical plants, pharmaceuticals and agro chemicals. Its products and services include information technology, engineering and fabrication services, oil field chemicals, textile auxiliary chemicals, pharmaceutical intermediates and industrial gases. Its products include Methyl Monoethanolamine (MMEA), Methyl Diethanolamine (MDEA), Ethyl Diethanolamine, Mono-n-propyl Monoethanolamine, Mono-n-propyl Diethanolamine (PDEA), N-Formyl Morpholine (NFM), N-Acetyl Morpholine (NAM) and N-Butyl Morpholine (NBM).

Modison Metals Limited is an India-based holding company. The Company is engaged in the manufacture of electrical contacts/high voltage capacitors (hvc)/Sulfur Hexafluoride (SF6) contacts used in transmission, distribution and utilization of power. The Company manufactures electrical contacts for low, medium and high voltage switchgear industries. Its products for low voltage switchgear industries include Silver Tin Oxide Contact, Silver Brazing Alloy and Dispersion Strengthened Copper, among others. Its products for medium and high voltage switchgear industries include Copper Chromium Discs, Cast On Plugs and Segments, and Copper Tungsten Contacts, among others. It also offers silver bullion, including bars and coins. Its services include Refining and Recovery of Precious Metals, Melting and Assaying of Silver, Silver Plating, Research and Development of Contact Materials, and Electron Beam Welding. Modison Contacts Private Limited is the Company's subsidiary.

Keltech Energies Limited manufactures cartridge explosives, bulk emulsion explosives, mono methylamine nitrate (MMAN) solutions and a range of perlite products. The Company's principal products/services include industrial explosives and perlite. The Company operates in three segments, which include Explosives, Perlite and Site Contracts. The Company's geographical segments include India and Other Countries. The Company offers its products in three divisions, such as explosives division, perlite division and specialty product division. The Company's cartridge explosives plant with approximately 15,000 metric tons per annum capacity is located at Vishwasnagar near Mangalore city on the west coast. The Company's perlite plant manufactures a range of perlite products, such as Litemix for use in concrete aggregates, loose fill insulation and Fillite for explosives. The Company manufactures specialty products in couple-able plastic tubes for use in seismic and dredging applications.

Kemp & Company Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in trading in hard and soft luggage, and ladies handbags. The Company's segments include Trading Activity and Real Estate. The Trading Activity segment includes retailing of plastic molded suit cases, brief cases and vanity cases, and other travel goods and accessories. The Real Estate segment includes letting out of properties.

Amal Ltd is an India-based company engaged in offering basic chemicals. The Company is engaged in manufacturing and marketing bulk chemicals, such as sulfuric acid and oleum and their downstream products, such as sulfur dioxide and sulfur trioxide. The plant is located in Ankleshwar, Gujarat, India. It has an installed capacity of 140 metric ton (mt) per day. The Company sells these chemicals locally. The Company offers products to the dyes, fertilizer, personal care, petrochemical, pharmaceutical and textile industries.

Polychem Limited is engaged in the manufacturing of specialty chemicals and development of property/land. The Company manufactures basic chemicals, fertilizer and nitrogen compounds, plastics and synthetic rubber in primary forms, and engages in the real estate activities with own or leased property. It operates through two business segments: Property Development and Specialty Chemicals. Its Polymer division specializes in manufacture of polymers and co-polymers from styrene, divinyl benzene, acrylic acid and acrylates through either suspension polymerization route or emulsion polymerization route. Its product range includes Cross Linked Polystyrene (XLPS); Low Molecular weight Polystyrene (LMPS); Styrene Ethyl Acrylate Co-Polymer (Acrylate-C); Polyvinyl Butyral; Styrene Malaic Anhydride Co-polymer (SMA Co-polymer); Styrene Butyl Acrylate Co-polymer (SBA PC-50); Styrene Butyl Acrylate Co-polymer (SBA PC-30), and Poly Alpha Methyl Styrene (PAMS PC-290).

Transpek Industry Limited is a holding company. The Company is engaged in the manufacturing and export of a range of chemicals servicing customers from various industries. The Company manufactures various other chemical products, such as anti-knock preparations, anti-freeze preparations, liquids for hydraulic transmission, composite diagnostic or laboratory reagents, writing or drawing ink, chemical substance used in manufacturing of pesticides and other chemical product. The Company also manufactures organic and inorganic chemical compounds. Its organic products include Tri Ethylene Glycol Dichloride, Cetyl Chloride, Pivaloyl Chloride and Terephthaloyl Chloride. Its inorganic products include Thionyl Chloride, Sulphur Monochloride, Sulphur Trioxide and Chloro Sulphonic Acid. The Company's products are used in various applications, such as polymers, plastics, performance materials, agrochemicals, coatings, pharmaceuticals, personal care, flavors and fragrance.

Tuticorin Alkali Chemicals and Fertilizers Limited is engaged in manufacturing of soda ash and ammonium chloride (fertilizer). The Company's business segment consists of Tuticorin operations (soda ash/ammonium chloride-dual products). It produces other products, including ammonium chloride technical grade and pure grade, and sodium bicarbonate. Soda Ash (Sodium Carbonate) is an industrial chemical, which has applications in industries, such as soaps and detergents, glass, silicates, dyes and dyestuffs, bichromate, textiles and other products, including house cleaning and petroleum refining agents. Ammonium Chloride is a nitrogenous fertilizer, which has applications in the farming community for crops, including paddy, sugarcane, groundnut, banana, coconut, cotton and mulberry. Ammonium chloride technical grade and pure grade is used in batteries, pharmaceuticals and for galvanizing. Sodium Bicarbonate is used in manufacture of biscuits, pharmaceuticals and fire extinguishers.

Punjab Alkalies & Chemicals Limited is involved in chemicals business. The Company's products include Caustic Soda Lye, Liquid Chlorine, Hydrochloric Acid, Sodium Hypochlorite and Hydrogen Gas. The Company's caustic soda products are used in paper and paper pulp, soap and detergents, textile and dye stuff industry, aluminum industry, linear alkyl benzene (LAB), and viscose and rayon. Its chlorine products are used in water treatment plants, paper manufacturing and stable bleaching powder. Its hydrochloric acid products are used in water demineralization in power and fertilizer plants, metal pickling and preparation of various metal chloride. Its sodium hypochlorite products are used in textile bleaching, laundry trade and dis-infection of drinking water. Its hydrogen products are used in hydrogenation of vegetable oils, optical fiber units, as a coolant in power plants and as a fuel. The Company's plant is located at Naya Nangal in District Ropar, Punjab, India.

TANFAC Industries Limited offers Aluminium Fluoride, AHF Acid and Sulphuric Acid, and Speciality Chemicals. The Company operates through Fluro-Chemicals in India segment. Its product range includes Boron Trifluoride Complexes, Diluted Hydrofluoric Acid, Iso Butyl Acetophenone, Acetic Acid, Peracetic Acid, Oleum, Gymsum (Anhydride), Potassium Bifluoride, Potassium Fluoride and Sodium Silico Fluoride. Its aluminum fluoride is used as a makeup ingredient in the molten electrolyte of the aluminum reduction cell and in electrolytic process for refining aluminum, and sulfuric acid has applications, such as manufacture of fertilizers, treatment of metals and purification of petroleum. Its anhydrous hydrofluoric acid is used as a catalyst in petrochemical industry for alkylation, and in the manufacture of refrigerants, and organic and inorganic fluorine compounds. Its manufacturing facilities are spread over 60 acres in the chemical complex of SIPCOT Industrial Estate, Cuddalore.
Shreejal Info Hubs Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in database activities. The Company is focusing its resources in operating information technology (IT) enabled services.

TGV SRAAC Limited, formerly Sree Rayalaseema Alkalies and Allied Chemicals Limited, is a producer of chlor-alkali products and manufactures castor derivatives and fatty acids. The Company is engaged in the manufacturing of caustic soda lye/flakes, caustic potash lye/flakes, and soap noodles. Its business segments include Chemicals, Oils & Fats, and Power. It deals in chlorine, sodium hypochlorite, hydrogen, potassium hydroxide and potassium carbonate under Chemicals Segment. The Fatty Acids Division produces over 29,778 million tons of stearic acid and soaps noodles, and the Castor Oil Division produces over 9,044 million tons Castor Oil. Its castor derivatives include Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Ricinoleic Acid, and Methyl 12 hydroxy stearic acid (HSA). It is engaged in examining the avenues for the 28-megawatt power plant project at Bellary. It is a provider of mercury-free caustic lye for soap manufacturers and exports its products to Sri Lanka, Malaysia, Sharjah, Bahrain, and Dubai.
Rajath Finance Limited is a non-banking financial services company (NBFC). The Company is based in India.

IST Limited is a manufacturing company. The Company offers precision engineering components/assemblies. The Company's products include automotive transmission parts, carburetor parts for two wheeler, fuel injection part for four wheeler, high precision mechanical electro-mechanical timers, precision components and assemblies, communication equipment and office products, consumer durable and white goods, oral care products, instrumentation and engineering goods, and dental and orthopedic screws. The Company manufactures precision turned, milled, drilled components and stampings for various industries, such as auto component industry, white goods industry, consumer goods industry, and dental and orthopedic implants. The Company offers cutters, drillers and reamers, compression molding tools, sheet metal tooling of various types and jigs fixture, among others. The Company operates in India. Gurgaon Infospace Limited is the subsidiary of the Company.

Diamant Infrastructure Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in the manufacturing of SFRC (steel fiber reinforce concrete) products. The Company operates in two business segments: Infrastructure and Trading. The Company's products include SFRC Rain Water drains and RE Wall Cap. The Company executes various contracts of road projects.

Panasonic Carbon India Co. Limited is engaged in the manufacture of carbon rods. The Company operates through the segment of midget electrodes as a component of dry cell batteries. The Company manufactures over 40 sizes and approximately six grades of carbon rods. The Company's product categories include UM-1(R-20/D size), UM-2(R-14/C size), UM-3(R-6/AA size), UM-4(R-03/AAA size) and special size carbon rods. The Company operates a manufacturing plant/factory in Nellore District, Andhra Pradesh. The Company is a subsidiary of Panasonic Corporation. The Company exports its products to Panasonic Group Battery Factories in Poland, Peru, Thailand, Indonesia, Brazil, Costa Rica and other African customers.

Finkurve Financial Services Limited is an India-based holding company. The Company is a loan company, which is engaged in providing long term and short term loans to other corporate/firms. The Company’s segments include Non-Banking Finance (NBFC) Activity, which is engaged in the business activity of non-banking financial services; Foreign Exchange Trading, which through its subsidiary, Supama Forex Private Limited, carries on the business activity of dealing/buying and selling of foreign exchange as Full Fledge Money Changer, and Commodities Trading, which through its subsidiary, Finkurve Commodities Private Limited, carries on the business activity of trading in commodities through market and recognized stock exchange. The Company is also involved in the activity of leasing and financing, as well as trading in forex. Its portfolio of products and services include Bullion India, Go Saffron, Bullion++, Structured Products and Gold and Silver Indices (GSI).

Indian Infotech & Software Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in manufacturing information technology (IT) and Software Products. The Company is also engaged in Interest Income. The Company is engaged in Finance software development/IT enabled services. The Company is engaged in providing financial assistance for various business activities, and trading and consultancy in IT. The Company is a non-banking finance company (NBFC) and principle business activity of the Company is Finance and loan. The Company's products include providing software support, software development, selling of desktop, laptop, printers, scanner, other hardware product with hardware services and networking services to its customers. The Company is engaged in providing services of Finance and Loan to industrial enterprises and promoting companies engaged in industrial and trading business in India.

Caprihans India Limited is a manufacturer of polyvinyl chloride (PVC) films. The Company is engaged in manufacturing of plastics and polymers. It manufactures and sells PVC films, polyvinylidene chloride (PVDC) coated Films and plastic products. Its products include Sunblis, which is a PVC rigid film suited for packaging of pharmaceutical products, food products and other specific products; Sundene, which is a PVDC Coated PVC Film for various requirements; Sunblis Jewel, which are metallic blister films for pharma packaging, and Sunplex Bilam/Trilam, which are multi-layer films with or without PVDC coating for pharma and food packaging. The Company also offers a range of other products, such as Sunplex Mpac/Lampac, which are metallized films for pharma and food packaging; Sunvic, which are rigid PVC films used for various specialized products, such as stationery and cards, and Sunflex, which is PVC Sheeting produced in a range of colors and prints.

Garware Marine Industries Limited is engaged in the repair of vessels. The Company's principal product/service is ship repair services. The Company is involved in the manufacture and marketing of fishing nets made from nylon yarn. The Company's range of manufacture stretches from 210 Denier/2 ply to 36 ply/from a minimum 10 millimeters to 400 millimeters mesh sizes and upto maximum 600 mesh depth (MD). It also provides single knot and double knot on order for certain construction sizes. The Company produces approximately 30 tons of nets per month. The Company markets its products through a chain of distributors/agents. It has a ship repair division. The Company offers its products in international markets. The Company has its own twisting division in its factory to produce twine for captive consumption. The Company's factory is located at Ahmednagar in Maharashtra.

Hardcastle & Waud Manufacturing Company Limited is an India-based company engaged in industrial chemicals business and investments. The Company operates through two segments: Industrial Chemicals and Investments. The Industrial Chemicals segment includes metal working and maintenance products, among others. The Investment segment relates primarily to the activity of investment.

Mapro Industries Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in the business of civil construction on sub-contract basis. The Company focuses on trading activity of iron, steel and cement. The Company is engaged in the Subcontracting segment. The Company is also engaged in construction activities. The Company's operation includes all aspects of real estate development, from the identification and acquisition of land to the planning, execution and marketing of its projects, and the maintenance and management of its completed developments. The Company provides its services through its third-party vendor contactors. The Company is engaged in the field of trading and infrastructure related activities. The Company carries out its activity in domestic markets.

Yamini Investments Company Limited is a business investment and holding company. The Company's principal products/services include investments. The Company carries on activities of various investments by way of capital, loan, equity participation and financial assistance.

Kothari World Finance Limited is an India-based holding company. The Company is a non-banking finance company, which is involved in license fees, and share trading and commodities activities. The Company is engaged in finance and investment in properties, share trading and rental business by giving properties on license basis. The Company provides advisory services to its customers. The Company's investment division advises on investment and divestment strategies across the real estate canvas. The Company focuses on providing information on Indian property markets mainly in state of Maharashtra and Gujarat. The Company assists developers, landlords, investors and occupiers in getting properties, be it commercial, residential or land, as investments and as places in which to live and work. The Company serves various sectors, such as construction, industrial complex, real estate, software, securities exchange services and others.

Wall Street Finance Limited is engaged in the business of money changing and money remittance. The Company is also engaged in foreign currency business and money transfer business. It offers its services through Spicemoney, which is a financial house dealing in money exchange and money remittance services. Its money exchange services range from foreign currencies, traveler's checks and forex prepaid cards. It also offers cash advance against international credit card for tourists and non-resident Indians (NRIs) visiting India. Spicemoney is an agent for Western Union in India, and the money sent through Western Union can be received through its network of over 36 Branches and approximately 5000 sub-agents. Its product, Spice Mudra, offers domestic money transfer service in partnership with Spice Digital, which enables customers to transfer money instantly through its agent network across India by accepting cash from customers and transferring it directly to their bank accounts.

India Cements Capital Limited is a holding company. The Company is engaged in buying and selling of foreign currencies as moneychanger holding license. The Company, through For Xchange division, is engaged in money-changing services. In addition to buying and selling of all currencies and travelers checks, the division also stocks Axis Banks Travel Currency Prepaid Cards besides being sub-agents for Western Union Money Transfer. The For Xchange division operates over 17 centers. The Company, through Coromandel Travels division, is engaged in extending travel related services, such as ticketing, hotel bookings, car rentals and leisure packages, and miscellaneous services, such as passport issuance and visa processing. The Company, through Midas Advisory division, extends advisory services on the foreign exchange market to exporters and importers under the brand name, Midas Advisory. The Company deals in cash market, and futures and options, and extends depository participant services.

Kailash Auto Finance Limited is an India-based non-bank financing company (NBFC). The Company is engaged in the business of financing. The Company's principal activities include investment in securities. The Company is specialized in providing finances for the commercial transport vehicle industry. The Company is primarily focused in providing inter corporate loans, personal loans, loans against shares and securities, loans against properties, trade financing, bills discounting, trading in shares and securities, and arbitrage business in stock market. The Company is also involved in providing finance and loans through various processes for a range of business purposes and for meeting the demands of the new age technopreneur and retailpreneur.

Shristi Infrastructure Development Corporation Limited is an infrastructure development company. The Company specializes in the development of infrastructure projects, such as roads, power plants, townships, hotels, residential and commercial complexes. Its segments include Construction & Allied services, Infrastructure Development and Others. It is focused on the engineering, procurement and construction (EPC) for power plants and project management consultant (PMC) contracts for special economic zones (SEZs) and high-rise buildings. It has operations in the fields of infrastructure construction, infrastructure development and infrastructure consultancy. Its projects include residential, commercial, retails, health and wellness, transport and terminals, and construction projects. Its projects include The V Kolkata, Krishnagar Sentrum, Vipani Udaipur Rajasthan, Aitorma Agartala Centrum, Kanchan Janga Integrated Park-Siliguri and Aitorma Agartala Centrum.

Capital Trust Limited is an India-based non-banking financial company (NBFC). The Company is engaged in the activity of leasing and hire purchase, and financed items, such as plant and equipment, machinery, office equipment and generators. It offers enterprise loans in the micro, small and medium enterprise sector. The Company runs its business through approximately 85 branches spread over 20 districts in states of Uttar Pradesh, Uttarakhand, Haryana and Punjab. Its products include enterprise loans and microfinance loans. The Company provides retail finance for two wheelers and consumer durables, among others. The Company is engaged in providing loans to the customers that are engaged in a range of activities, such as dairy and livestock, services, retail, manufacturing, trading, food, agriculture, two-wheeler, home improvement loan and commercial vehicle.

Wisec Global Limited is a human resource for custom house. The Company provides share transfer and allied services, and stock broking services. It offers a range of debt market services, including sale and purchase of debt instruments, such as government securities, debentures, taxable/tax free bonds issued by various Public Sectors Undertakings (PSUs), Units and Mutual funds. It offers information technology (IT) enabled services, body shopping and human resource management (HRM), and commercial application software. Its IT enabled services facility caters to corporate entities, data management for statistical analysis and online data communications relate to capital market information. It offers body shopping for various private sector corporates and public sector undertakings. Its HRM services are manpower planning, recruitment and training, facility management services onsite manpower placement for electronic data processing (EDP) activities and vendor evaluation, among others.

Shalibhadra Finance Ltd. is engaged in finance and investment activities. The Company is an asset finance company focusing on rural, semi-urban and other under banked geographies of the states of Gujarat and Maharashtra. The Company's services include systematic investment plan (SIP) and portfolio management service (PMS), fixed deposit services, online investment services and investment information awareness programs. The Company provides services in secondary market place for banks, retirement funds, corporates, primary dealers, mutual funds and institutional investors. It offers services to provident fund, gratuity and superannuation trusts in retirement trust category. It also offers broking services to retail investors for government securities. The Company also offers state loans and treasury bills. It offers services to non-resident Indian (NRI) investors.

Cranes Software International Limited is a scientific and engineering products and solutions provider. The Company is engaged in providing software services. Its segments include Proprietary Products and Services, and Product Alliances. The Company's geographical segments include export and domestic. The Company's business interests include software products (proprietary products and product alliances), solutions (business data analytics and engineering services) and services (training in domain areas). The Company is focused on product development, consulting, distribution and training. The Company offers a range of proprietary products, including SYSTAT, SigmaPlot, SigmaStat, SigmaScan, TableCurve 2D, TableCurve 3D, PeakFit, NISA, XID, XIP, Survey ASYST, iCapella and InventX. It also offers solutions, which include cranes engineering services and cranes business analytics services. Its services include training, university program, development solutions and training products.

Ashirwad Capital Limited is engaged in financial/investment activities. The Company is a non-banking finance company (NBFC). The Company is engaged in the business of investment and lending. The Company offers insights delivering independent information, opinions and solutions. The Company is engaged in the acquisition of shares and securities.

Aravali Securities & Finance Limited (ASFL) is an India-based non-banking financial company (NBFC), which is into the business of investment and financing. The Company is an investment company engaged in doing long term and short-term investments. The Company's segments include Shares & Securities, and Financing. The Company is engaged in the business of finance and investment/trading in securities.

Jay Ushin Limited is engaged in the business of manufacturing and sale of components, such as lock and key sets, combination switches, heater control panels, and door latches for automobiles. The Company's geographical segments include Within India and Outside India. The Company offers products in categories, including security system, switches, body parts and others. Its security system category includes key sets, immobilizer, locksets, keyless entry and remote locking. Its switches category includes panel switches, handle bar, hazard warning, power window, and defogger switches, and stop and back-up lamps. Its body parts category includes central locking, door handles and striker. Its others category includes heater controls panel and fuel units. The Company has manufacturing units in Gurgaon, Manesar, Jharsa (Haryana), Bhiwadi (Rajasthan), Sriperumbudur (Tamilnadu), Mehsana (Gujarat) and Bengaluru (Karnataka).

Solid Stone Company Limited is a holding company, which is engaged in the processing and sale of natural and semi-precious stones. The Company is also engaged in trading in natural stones and related products. The Company is engaged in the business of building material and allied building activities. The Company's brands include Stone Source and Xylos by Wood Source. The Company's range of products include Natural Stone; Granite; Semi Precious Stone; Finishes; Articles; Stone Care; Mosaics, such as Stone Mosaics, Metal Mosaics and Mix Mosaics; Marble, such as Indian Marble and Exoitic Marble, and Wooden Flooring, such as Laminate Flooring, Engineered Wood Flooring, Earthly Elements and Deck Flooring. The Company's natural stone products include Slate Stone, Quartzite, Lime Stone and Sand Stone. The Company's stone care products include Stone Spray-N-Seal and Stone Color Enhancer. The Company has manufacturing facilities in Palghar and retail outlets at Mumbai and Delhi.

Mangalam Organics Limited is an India-based chemical manufacturing company. The Company is engaged in the manufacturing and selling activities of Camphor, Sodium Acetate and by-products, Terpene Chemicals, Synthetic Resins and Phenol formaldehyde (PF) resins. The Company's Terpene products include Camphor Technical, Camphor A Grade, Camphor Fluffy Grade, Camphene, Dipentene, Sodium Acetate Trihydrate, Camphor Oil, and Pine Oil 870 & 880. Its Resin products include Terpene Phenolic Resin, Alkyl Phenolic Resin 1, Alkyl Phenolic Resin 2 and Gum Rosin. The Company offers camphor tablets under the brand name mangalam. The Company exports its products to Europe, the United States, Africa and the Middle East. The Company's manufacturing units are located at Kumbhivali Village, Taluka Kahalapur, Khopoli, District Raigad, Maharashtra.

Sri KPR Industries Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in the sale of asbestos cement pressure pipes. The Company is also engaged in the sale of wind electric power. Its segments include Wind Power and Pipes. The Company is engaged in pipe manufacturing and wind power generation. It manufactures air condition (AC) PRESSURE PIPES and FITTINGS UNDER MAZZA PROCESS from 80 to 1000 millimeters (mm) diameter of Class-15 to 25. The Company supplies AC Pressure Pipes and Fitting to the states of Andhra Pradesh, Tamil Nadu, Kerala, Karnataka and Gujarat, among others for use in the drinking water supply schemes undertaken by respective state government departments. The Company's two megawatts (MW) wind power mill is located at Dewas District in Madhya Pradesh. The total manufacturing capacity of the Company is 50,000 tons per annum (TPA). Sri KPR Infra & Projects Limited is the subsidiary of the Company, which is engaged in the sale of pipes.

Saint-Gobain Sekurit India Limited is engaged in the manufacture of laminated and toughened tempered glass. The Company is involved in the business of manufacture and sale of automotive glass. The Company manufactures and supplies automotive glazing for auto manufacturers in India, as well as the replacement market. The Company is engaged in the processing of glasses to manufacture windshields, door glasses and backlites for the automobile sector. It offers a range of windshields, tempered glasses and tempered backiltes for applications, including passenger cars, utility vehicles, commercial vehicles and three wheelers. The Company offers products for acoustic control, thermal comfort and hydroscopic glasses. The Company's manufacturing plants are located near Pune. The Company's holding company is Saint-Gobain Sekurit France S.A. Its ultimate holding company is Compagnie de Saint-Gobain.

Restile Ceramics Limited is in the business of manufacturing vitrified tiles. The Company offers a range of collections, such as Original Collection, Makers Collection, Mystique Collection, Masters Collection, and Tom Dick & Harry Collection. Its Original Collection includes ABACUS, CHAMPAGNE, ELENA, ICONIC, KOTTA GREEN, MIST, PIXIE, PLUTO, SAHARA, STEEL GREY and SUPER POLO. Its Makers Collection includes FLAMED BEIGE, FLAMED GREY, FLAMED RED, PAVILLION BEIGE, PAVILLION RED, ROUGE BEIGE, ROUGE GREY, ROUGE RED, STEPUP GREY and STEPUP RED. Its Mystique Collection includes ICEBERG, RESTILE X and ZIRCONIA. Its Masters Collection includes BLEND, COKA, FANTASIA, FROST, HAZEL, MOCHA, NIRVANA, ROSSA and SHANGRI-LA. Its Tom Dick & Harry Collection includes DOVE, FALCON, GOLDENEYE, GULL, HERON, OPERA and WAXEN. The Company offers its products to various industries, such as airports, educational, entertainment, financial, government, healthcare, hospitality, religious, retails and show rooms.

High Ground Enterprise Limited is an India-based company engaged in providing engineering, procurement, construction management, and media, consulting and allied services. The Company operates through two segments: Engineering, Procurement, Construction Management (EPCM), and Media, Consulting and Allied Services. The Company's EPCM Division is engaged in construction contracts, consultancy and contract services, supply and erection of equipment/systems and civil works. Its Media, Consulting and Allied Services Division is engaged in content development and integration, post-production and technical media services business process outsourcing (BPO). The Company's subsidiaries include Colour Bar Private Limited, which is engaged in post-production and other allied media activities, and HGEL Integrated Private Limited, which is engaged in infra-projects, namely, mining and exploration of natural resources and stone mining.

Switching Technologies Gunther Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in manufacturing and sale of electrical and electronic components. The Company manufactures electronic components, such as reed switches, proximity sensors and ball switches. The Company manufactures miniature and standard reed switches, including pressurized switches and change over switches. It offers various sensors, such as automotive sensor, acceleration sensor/crash sensor, pendulum sensor and magneto resistivo sensor. Its magnetic proximity switches are used in various areas, such as automotive industry, industrial and production equipment, as well as alarm and control systems. The Company also offers a spectrum of non-mercury inclination switches. The Company is a subsidiary of Gunther America Inc.

Precision Electronics Limited provides communication equipment, services and infra services (works contracts). The Company's segments include Telecom and Infra Services. Its business divisions include Electronics & Telecommunication Division, and Infrastructure Division. In the Electronics & Telecommunication Division, its products include wire-line, wireless, power systems, data logger for Indian railways, voice logger and telescopic masts. The Infrastructure Division undertakes turnkey assignments of civil, electrical and networking works, and turnkey installation and commissioning of radars, sensors, data links and the command and control room at defense airfields and harbors. In the services segment, the Company offers engineering, procurement and construction (EPC) contracts, infrastructure services, hi-tech installation and commissioning, and maintenance repair and overhaul (MRO) services. It provides services for mission-critical and critical infrastructure end use in India.

CMI Limited is a cable manufacturing company. The Company is involved in the entire process chain from development, design and manufacture to marketing and distribution of cables. Its product portfolio includes electric cables for railways, metros, utility, buildings, data transmission, instrumentation, submarine cables, special cables and extra high voltage (EHV) cables. Its product range includes Bare overhead conductor, Control Cables, Instrumentation Cables, Aerial Bunched Cables, Thermocouple Cables, Fire Alarm Cables, Welding Cables, Flexible Cables, Composite Cables, Balise Cables, Counter Quad Cables, Axle Counter Cables, Hard Drawn Copper Contact Wire, Catenary Wire, Low-Smoke Zero Halogen Cables, Jelly Filled Telecom Cables, Field Bus Cables, Profibus Cables, Telephone Cables, Fire Resistant Wires and Flexibles, Mining cables, Nuclear cables, Cables for Wind Turbines, Antitheft Cables, Shipboard Cables, Naval Ship Cables, Braided Cables and Air field Lighting Cables.

Dutron Polymers Limited is engaged in the manufacture of plastic products. The Company is engaged in manufacture of high-density polyethylene/polyvinyl chloride/chlorinated polyvinyl chloride (HDPE/PVC/CPVC) pipes. Its products include PVC braided hoses, flat delivery hoses, corrugated pipes and plastic sheets, medium-density polyethylene/polypropylene (MDPE/PP) pipe systems, and unplasticized PVC (uPVC) pipes and fittings. It offers plastic products for various types of piping applications in various markets, such as civil, for irrigation, drainage, sewer and gardening; industries, which includes chemicals, effluents, air and food; utilities, which includes water, gas and cable ducting, and building, which include soil, waste and rain water (SWR), and plumbing. It has presence in international markets of various Gulf countries, which include the United Arab Emirates, Saudi Arabia, Muscat, Qatar, Bahrain and Kuwait, and as well as Indonesia, Sri Lanka and various countries in Africa.

Alfa Transformers Limited is engaged in the manufacturing and repairs of transformers. The Company operates through the Transformer segment. It is engaged in power and distribution transformers from 10 kilovolt-amperes (KVA) to 10,000 KVA, step lap cold rolled grain oriented (CRGO) lamination and amorphous metal alloy core laminations. Its products include Single Phase-wound core type transformers; Power Transformers up to 15 mega volt amperes (MVA), 36 KV class; Stabilized output transformers; Low Loss energy efficient transformers; Transformers for Induction Furnace Duty, and Transformers for ARC and submerged arc furnace duty. It also provides project exports and consultancy. Its factory produces transformers up to and including 10 MVA, 36 KV class and the factory consists of divisions, including core cutting section, coil winding section, insulation and fabrication section, assembly section, fabrication and painting section, and testing/inspection.

Starlite Components Limited is engaged in providing Electronic Ballast, Lamp Components and Drivers and Lighting Fixtures, Fittings and Light-emitting diode (LED) Lamps. The Company's geographical segments include Domestic Market and Export Market. Its products include Lamp, Luminaire and Accessories. Its lamp products include LED Lamp, such as classic platinum range. Its compact fluorescent lamp (CFL) lamp products include integrated spiral, integrated - stick and non-integrated-stick, among others. Its induction lamp products include circular retrofit kit and rectangular retrofit kit. Its incandescent lamp product includes eco halogen. Its luminaire products include outdoor, such as facade, floodlight, and street light, among others. Its decorative product includes stand by lamp and wall lamp. Its furniture product includes linear, circular and LED flexi, among others. Its accessories include ballasts and igniters, drivers and transformers and led module and switches, among others.

G.R. Cables Limited is an India-based company, whose operations mainly relate to the Cables segment. The Company's factory is located at Rangareddy Guda, Balanagar Mandal in Mahabub Nagar District in Andhra Pradesh. The Company has no revenue from operations.

Ritesh International Limited is an India-based company engaged in the manufacturing and selling of stearic acid, fatty acids, glycerin and readymade garments. The Company's principal products include other non-edible oils. The Company's products have applications in rubber and polyvinyl chloride (PVC) industries. The Company's product range includes Stearic Acid (PVC and Rubber Grade, and Wonder Super Double Distilled Grade); Refined Glycerine (IW Grade) and Distilled Fatty Acid/Fatty Acid Pich.
Williamson Financial Services Limited is an India-based non-banking financial company. The Company's principal business is investments. The Company is engaged in the business of financial services.

RACL Geartech Limited, formerly Raunaq Automotive Components Limited, is an India-based company, which is engaged in automotive gears and components business. The Company is involved in manufacturing of gears, shafts and other automotive component parts. The Company, through its manufacturing unit, produces automotive components in the field of motorcycles and scooters, three wheeler passenger, four wheeler passenger, cargo vehicles, agricultural machinery, tractors, all-terrain vehicle (ATV), and light and heavy commercial vehicles, among others. The Company also manufactures sub-assemblies, industrial gears for electrical switch gears and circuit breakers, and winches and cranes. The Company's products include Transmission Gears & Shafts, Reduction Gears Trains CVT Gear Boxes, Engine Timing Gears, Sub-Assemblies, Sprockets & Ratchets, Precision Machined Parts, Synchronizing Cones & Rings and Industrial Gears. The Company's manufacturing plants are located at Uttar Pradesh.

Samkrg Pistons And Rings Limited is engaged in the manufacture of auto components, such as piston assemblies. The Company manufactures and supplies pistons, piston pins and piston rings for gasoline and diesel internal combustion (I.C) engines for scooters, motorcycles, cars, tractors, light commercial vehicles (LCV's), stationary engines and other special applications from 35 millimeters (mm) to 130 mm diameter. It supplies piston rings with hard chrome plating, nitrated, min phosphated and ferrous coated in rectangular, wedge key stone shaped Napier with plain and barrel honed. Its piston pins are made in various alloy steels and heat treated. It offers piston rings from 35 mm to 130 mm long in special iron, malleable martensite iron and nodular or ductile cast iron. Its steel rings are available in the diameter range of 35 mm to 130 mm with an axial width from 0.8 mm to 3 mm for motor cycles, cars, LCV's, heavy commercial vehicles (HCV's), tractors and industrial engines.

Sibar Autoparts Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in automobile casting and electrical casting. The Company's products include gravity die casting, low pressure die casting, high pressure die casting, centrifugal casting and electro plating. The Company offers automotive castings, such as cylinder heads, manifolds, cylinder blocks, Indian railways castings and others, and electrical castings. The Company's electro plating services include nickel silicon carbide coating and hard chrome plating. The Company's cylinder heads include air cooled cylinder heads and water cooled cylinder heads. The Company offers a range of cylinder blocks, such as two stroke cylinder blocks and four stroke cylinder blocks. The Company's factory is located at Renigunta Road, Tirupati. The Company has an installed capacity of 540,000 numbers.

Stone India Limited is principally engaged in producing railway products. The Company's segments include Railway products and Services, and Biotoilets. Its products include train lighting alternators, critical loco brake valve, air brake wagon and coaches, pantographs, slack adjusters, panel mounted brake system for locomotive, rolling stock spares business and air dryers. The Company's products also include conventional products, including brakes, loco safety and train power; solar products, including round Mounted Plant, Hilly Area Plant, Commercial Roof Plant and Household Plant; sanitation; PSD; vertical transportation; exports, and brochure. The Company provides bio toilets and control discharge toilet systems (CDTS). The Company's projects include a solar energy project, which produces power. It has two subsidiaries, which include Stone Intermodal Private Limited and Stone Biotech Private Limited.

Artson Engineering Limited is engaged in the manufacture of structural metal products, and industrial and infrastructure projects. The Company is in the business of engineering, procurement and construction (EPC) contracts in oil, gas and hydrocarbon (OG&H) sector, steel and power sector and ancillary services, including manufacturing activity. The Company's segments are Domestic and Overseas. The Company's projects are executed both in India and abroad. It executes EPC/construction contracts in Tankages, piping and mechanical static equipment. It has executed various projects in oil refinery tankages, piping and mechanical packages, chemical, oil and gas, refinery product storage and distribution terminals, cross-country pipelines and mechanical equipment construction projects in metals, mining and power. It has manufacturing units located at Nasik, Nagpur and Jamshedpur. The Company is a subsidiary of Tata Projects Limited.

Frontier Springs Limited is engaged in manufacturing of coil springs, leaf springs, link-hofmann busch (LHB) springs and forging items. The Company also manufactures tubes, pipes, hollow profiles, and tube and pipe fittings of cast-iron/cast steel. The Company offers L.B.springs and hot coiled compression springs for wagon, locomotives and carriage industries. The Company's forging products include mass transit, locomotive, replacement, vibration control, industrial, triple coil, double coil, single coil, railroad, transit car, helical steel, buffer, side bearing, journal, secondary, equalizer, primary, pipe hanger, valve, nuclear valve, coal crushing and shock absorber, among others. It supplies springs to railways, bogie manufactures, chittaranjan locomotive works, diesel locomotive works, integrate coach factory, rail coach factory, heavy engineering industries and original earth movers equipment manufacturers.

Rasandik Engineering Industries India Limited is engaged in manufacturing of sheet metal components for automobiles. The Company's products include tailored welding blanks, engineering solutions, tools & dies, BIW parts, suspension parts, fuel tanks, exhaust line & CNC bending, scissor jack and white goods. Its tailored welding blank parts include shot gun, door inner, longitudinal member and front tunnel. Its engineering solutions include hyper form draw analysis, tractor body parts, point cloud data and surface model, among others. Its tools & dies include skin and inner body components. Its BIW parts include front tunnel, rail roof rear and rail roof side, among others. It offers product design, analysis, prototyping and testing services. It supplies fuel tanks to a range of automobiles. Its white goods are air-conditioner body stampings and assemblies, refrigerator body stampings and washing machine body stampings.
