Taneja Aerospace and Aviation Limited is engaged in the business of manufacture and sale of various parts and components to aviation industry, providing services related to airfield and maintenance, repair and operations (MRO), and allied services. The Company's principal business activities include aircraft manufacturing and maintenance (AMM), and airfield. It operates through two segments: Aviation and Trading of Electrical Goods. The Company is involved in various aviation related business activities, which include AMM Center, and Aviation Infrastructure-Airfield and MRO. The capabilities of AMM Center include assembly, machining, sheet metal fabrication, composite manufacturing, heat treatment and design. It offers solution for construction of airfield and related infrastructure, which includes feasibility report, master planning, documentation for approval from authorities, construction of runways and allied structures, hangar and office construction, furnishing and landscaping.

Conart Engineers Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in providing civil construction services. The Company provides a range of general contracting and project management services for industrial, commercial and residential construction projects. The Company offers services to sectors, including heavy machinery, pharmaceuticals, chemicals, textiles and educational. Its general contracting services include cost monitoring and control, schedule development and control, subcontractor management, field engineering and site management, safety assurance, project accounting, change management, shop drawings and material submittal review, and quality control. The Company's project management services include pre-construction services, such as mater planning and bid phase, and construction services, such as cost estimating, change order evaluation, safety, technology services, constructability review, project cost controls and quality management/field inspections.

Ram Ratna Wires Limited is a producer and exporter of RR Shramik Magnet wires and Copper strips (enameled and paper covered). The Company has an installed capacity of approximately 24,000 metric ton (MT) per annum at its approximately two manufacturing plants.

Cosmo Ferrites Ltd. is engaged in manufacturing soft ferrites cores. The Company offers soft ferrites parts (Components). Its products include EC Cores, EE Cores, EI Cores, I Cores, EER Cores, EP Cores, ETD Cores, EFF Cores, EFC Cores, PQ Cores, POT CORES, PTS Cores, PM Cores, ROD Cores, UT Cores, Toroidal Cores and RM Cores with Hole. Its products are used in various applications, such as lighting, including Electronic Ballast for energy management Lamps, such as compact fluorescent lamp (CFL) and light emitting diode (LED), and Electronics Chokes for Tubular Lamps; Power Conditioning, including welding transformers, switch mode power supplies, medical electronics, telecom power supplies and induction heating applications; electromagnetic interference (EMI) filters/chokes/sensors, including EMI chokes and energy meters, and solar inverter. It exports its products to various countries, such as Europe, the United States, the United Kingdom, Thailand, Malaysia, China and Sri Lanka.

Bharat Seats Limited is engaged in the manufacture of seating system, molded carpets and extruded components for Maruti Suzuki India Limited, as well as seats and frames for Suzuki Motor Cycle India Pvt. Ltd. The Company's product range includes four wheeler seating system, two-wheeler seating system, two-wheeler frames and sheet metal components, railway seats and berths, and two-wheeler main frame. The Company offers car seats assemblies, carpet sets for automobiles, motorcycle seats, and other sales and traded goods. The Company has installed equipment for a range of seating systems, such as high pressure polyurethane machines for foam molding, which include polyurethane molding lines for making polyurethane pads, conveyerised assembly lines for seat assembly, carpet lamination, molding and punching equipment, pipe end swaging machine, tube end fine boring machine and mechanical press. The Company's plants are located in Gurgaon, Haryana.

Machino Plastics Limited is engaged in the manufacture of plastics injection molded automotive components. The Company produces plastic molded parts of motor vehicles and accessories. The Company manufactures injection molded automotive components, such as bumpers, instrumental panels, trims and grills as original equipment, and for spare parts markets. The Company deals with bulky and all sizes of plastic automotive components. The Company has capabilities in molding smaller and intricate functional and aesthetic parts in automotive and other industries. The Company has plants in Gurgaon and Manesar. The Company has over 40 injection molding machines with sizes ranging from 100 tons to 3,150 tons clamping force. The Company has presence in India.

ADC India Communications Limited is engaged in providing connectivity solutions to suit individual enterprise and telecom service provider requirements. The Company provides copper and fiber physical connectivity in telecommunications and data networking solutions, including structured cabling. The Company operates through two segments: Telecommunication and IT- Networking. The Company's products and services include enterprise, carrier, broadcast and entertainment, and wireless. The Company provides fiber and copper connectivity solutions for video, audio, and data networks and lead the broadcast industry in fiber-based third generation (3G) and high-definition (HD) network solutions. It offers solutions for enterprise networks, carrier networks, broadcast and entertainment, and wireless service providers. Its subsidiaries include ADC Communications (Australia) Pty Ltd., CommScope Connectivity Solutions LLC, CommScope Connectivity (Wuxi) Co, Ltd. and CommScope Connectivity LLC.

Coventry Coil-o-Matic (Haryana) Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in automobile operations. The Company's products include compression springs; extension springs (tension); torsion springs and wire forms. It offers compression springs in wire diameters from 0.2 millimeters to 17.2 millimeters in various forms, such as standard, barrel, conical, hour-glass, pig-tail and mini-block. The Company offers extension springs (tension) in wire diameters from 0.2 millimeters to 13.0 millimeters in all types of extensions and hooks. It provides torsion springs in wire diameters from 0.2 millimeters to 12.0 millimeters in single and double torsion. In addition, it offers wire forms in wire diameters from 0.2 millimeters to 8.0 millimeters in all kinds of wire forms. It offers products for various applications, such as brake actuators, clutches, circuit breakers, dampers, dies, motors, pressure switches, pressure plates, trunk lid, door checker, hinges, engine valves and ejectors.

Ind Bank Housing Limited is an India-based housing finance company. The Company is focused on recovery of housing loans and other assets. The Company recovers dues from various categories of borrowers and applies the same for reduction of public deposits.

Sika Interplant Systems Limited (Sika) is a holding company. The Company is primarily engaged in the business of manufacturing and rendering services in engineering products, projects and designs. The Company offers engineering products for aerospace and defense. The Company's Engineered Projects & Systems group offers Design, Development, Precision Manufacturing, Assembly, Certification, Supply and Integration of Systems, and implementation of Projects. The Company's Products & Systems group offers technology Products and Systems for Aerospace, Space, Marine and Land applications. The Company's products include Airborne and Ship borne Handling Systems, Underwater Systems, Air Transport Rack (ATR)/Electronic Units, Clean Energy Systems, Special equipment for Automotive industry, Drives, Amplifiers, Controllers, Feedback Sensors, Tachometers, Resolvers, Potentiometers, Pedestals, Tracking Systems, Quick Disconnecting Couplings, Air Intake particle separators and Test Systems.

IP Rings Ltd. is an automotive components manufacturer. The Company is engaged in the manufacturing of parts and accessories of engines. The Company operates through the segment of manufacture of Auto Component, including piston rings, differential gears, pole wheel and other transmission components. The Company specializes in the production of piston rings in high carbon high alloy steels and nodular iron with a range of surface coatings that find application in low emission engines. It also produces a series of transmission parts and other components for automotive and related industries employing a precision forging technology. It offers various types of rings, including Top Ring, Second Ring, Oil Ring and Honeywell (Turbo Charger). Its one-component foam (OCF) range of products include Rotor Shaft-1, Synchrocone with Lining, Synchrocone, Rotor Shaft-2, Gear Shift Sleeve, Gear and Pinion-Three Wheelers, Gear and Pinion-Tractors, Lock Ring, Nut Mutter, Dog Clutch and Polewheel-01.

Gujarat Borosil Limited is an India-based solar company. The Company is engaged in manufacturing flat glass. The Company is involved in manufacturing solar glass tempered or annealed glass, and patterned (figured) glass. The Company is engaged in low iron solar glass production for application in solar power sector. The Company produces patterned glass for architectural applications. The Company offers solar glass for applications in photo voltaic modules, solar thermal flat plate collectors and greenhouses. The Company's manufacturing facility is located at Govali, District Bharuch, Gujarat.

Hindustan Fluorocarbons Limited is an India-based company, which is involved in manufacturing of chemicals. The Company is engaged in manufacturing of polytetrafluoroethylene (PTFE). The Company also manufactures carbon fiber microelectrodes-22 (CFM-22) and tetrafluoroethylene (TFE). Its products include CFM-22, TFE, Poly-Suspension and Poly-Emulsion. It is involved in partial conversion of Telomar. It is engaged in development of filled grades with modified PTFE. It is also focused on the development of Fluoro Specialty Chemicals (FSC). Its Benzotrifluoride (BTF) is a fluoro chemical used as a drug intermediate. The Company is a subsidiary of Hindustan Organics Chemicals Limited.

Kingfa Science & Technology (India) Limited, formerly Hdro S & S Industries Limited, is engaged in the manufacturing of modified thermoplastics business. The Company operates through Reinforced Polypropylene segment. The Company manufactures and supplies Reinforced Polypropylene Compounds, Thermoplastics Elastomers and Fiber Re-Inforced composites. Its Polypropylene is modified by the addition of reinforcements, such as talc, chalk, mica and glass fiber for use as a metal substitute in engineering applications. It manufactures a range of thermoplastic elastomers under the HYPRENE brand name. The Company's products and materials are used in automobile, electronic appliances, industrial equipment, consumer goods, packaging and toys, among others. Its manufacturing facilities are located at Pudukkottai in Tamil Nadu; Puducherry; Jejuri in Pune, and Manesar in Delhi. The Company has a total compounding capacity of approximately 35,000 million metric tons annually (MTA).

Venlon Enterprises Limited is engaged in the business of Film, and Formaldehyde and Para Formaldehyde. The Company's segments include Film, Formaldehyde, Para Formaldehyde and Wind Mill. The Company's products include PET chips, Polyester Film, Metalised Film, Formaldehyde, Paraformaldehyde, Methanol formaldehyde Solution (50%) and Wind Mill. The Company's plant is located at Mysore, Karnataka in South India which is approximately 10 Kilometers from Mysore City in Belwadi Industrial Suburb.

Acrysil Limited is a holding company. The Company is engaged in business of manufacturing Quartz Kitchen Sinks. The Company's products include Granite Sinks, Stainless Steel Sinks, Food Waste Disposer and Faucets. The Company offers appliances under various categories, including hobs, premium line chimney, oven, wine chillers, standard line chimney, designer line chimney, dish washers, microwave oven and ice makers. The Company's premium line chimney includes Arial, Blade Plus and Slider. The Company's hobs include Cera, Jazz, Samba, Tekno, Cajun and Waltz. The Company's ovens include Java, La-Jota and Macarena. The Company's standard line chimneys include Jive, Calypso 800, Calypso 1000 and Calypso. The Company's designer line chimneys include Ergoline, Ballet, Troya, Blade, Jazz and Latino. The Company's wine chillers include 16 Bottles Wine Chiller, 24 Bottles Wine Chiller and 28 Bottles Wine Chiller. Its dish washers include Dish Washer-1, Dish Washer-2 and Dish Washer-3.
Linear Industries Limited has not carried out any production activity. The Company is based in India.

Kesar Petroproducts Limited is engaged in the business of manufacturing of Phthalocyanine Blue Crude and its downstream products in India. The Company's main products include Petroproducts and Chemicals. The Company's pigment products include COPPER PHTHALOCYANINE (CRUDE) BLUE, CPC Crude Blue Activated, Alpha Blue 15.0, Alpha Blue 15.1, Beta Blue 15.3 and Pigment Green 7. The Company's naphthalene intermediates include Sulphonated Naphthalene, Nitro Naphthalenes and Amino Naphthalenes. The Company offers CPC Crude Blue in 25 kilograms high-density polyethylene (HDPE) bags/500 kilograms Polypropylene (PP) bags with polythene liners. The Company's production capacity in Copper Phthalocyanine Blue Crude is 1,500 metric tons per month, in Alpha Blue is 200 metric tons per month and in Pigment Green 7 is 50 metric tons per month. The Company has a global presence in over 15 countries.

Shree Hari Chemicals Export Limited is engaged in the business of hyaluronic acid (H-Acid) chemical products. The Company's products include acid dyes, direct dyes, intermediate dyes and reactive dyes. Its acid dyes are water-soluble anionic dyes that are applied to fibers, such as silk, wool, nylon and modified acrylic fibers from neutral to acid dye baths. Its direct dyes are available in various types, such as Class A-dyes, Class B-dyes and Class C-dyes. Its reactive dyes are cationic dyes, which are used for dyeing cellulose, protein and polyamide fibers, mostly found in power, liquid and print paste form. The Company exports its products to Switzerland, Europe, the United Kingdom, Canada, China and the Far East. The Company's plant is located at A/8, M.I.D.C. Industrial Area, Mahad, Dist. Raigad (Maharashtra).

Indo Borax & Chemicals Limited is engaged in the manufacturing of chemical products. The Company is engaged in offering boric/boron products. The Company operates a boric acid and borax plant at Pithampur, Madhya Pradesh. Its product, boric acid powder, has applications in metallurgical operation, electroplating industry, nylon dyeing, nylon manufacturing and agricultural use. Its product, boric acid granular, is used as catalyst. It also has applications in nuclear power plants. Its products are also used in eyewash, ointments, foot powder, shampoo, skin cream, mouthwash and veterinary formulations. Its product, borax decahydrate granular, is used in fused products, such as glass, glass fiber ceramics, frits, glazed and porcelain enamels. It is also used in dishwashing products, such as soaps and detergents. Borax decahydrate crystal is used in fertilizers as micronutrients. Indoborax Infrastructure Private Limited is the Company's subsidiary.

Tirupati Starch and Chemicals Limited is engaged in developing, manufacturing and distribution of Maize Starch Powder, Dextrose Anhydrous identity preservation (I.P.) Maize Starch Powder (IP), Tirulose, Minimum Support Price (MSP) Vervosize, White Dextrin and Yellow Dextrin as its main products, and bye products, such as Hydrol, Maize Bran, Maize Cattle Feed, Maize Germ, Maize Gluton, Maize Husk Dry/ Wet and maize Starch Slurry. The Company's products include liquid glucose, dextrose anhydrous, dextrose monohydrate, corn gluten and corn germ, among others. It offers maize starch powder for use in pharmaceutical, textile, food, paint and paper industries; white and yellow dextrin for applications in adhesive, chemical and dyes, textile, and color industries, as well as in foundries, and liquid glucose for use in confectionary and ice-cream, bakery, and tanning industries among others. It also provides dextrose anhydrous for use in intravenous fluids.

Ashok Alco-Chem Limited is engaged in chemical manufacturing and minerals trading. The Company's segments include Chemical Division (Manufacturing) and Global Trading Division. It offers ethyl acetate, which is used in a range of coating formulations, such as epoxies, urethanes, cellulosics, acrylics and vinyls; glacial acetic acid, which is used in paint, varnish, lacquer and related products, and acetaldehyde, which is as an intermediate for the synthesis of other chemicals. It also offers ball clay, quartz and feldspar. In addition, it offers core minerals, such as bauxite, bentonite and kaolin, and other minerals, such as gypsum, bleaching earth and iron ore. Its manufacturing facility is located at Mahad Maharashtra Industrial Development Corporation (MIDC), Maharashtra, which is over 170 kilometers from Mumbai. It produces approximately 13,000 metric tons (MTs) of glacial acetic acid, over 30,000 MTs of ethyl acetate, and over 10,500 MTs of acetaldehyde per annum.

Alufluoride Limited is engaged in producing Aluminium Fluoride and related products. The Company's Aluminium Fluoride is produced with a technology by reacting dry Alumina Hydrate with Hydro-fluosilicic acid, which is generated from the fluorine recovery unit of the adjoining fertilizer complex. Fluorine gases are scrubbed with water to produce Hydro-fluosilicic acid. In the production process of Aluminium Fluoride, the Company produces two by-products, namely, Silica and Calcium Fluoride, which are also used in chemical industry. The Company offers Aluminium Fluoride in 50/25 kilograms packing in high density polyethylene (HDPE) bags with liner or as required by customers. Its Aluminium Fluoride is used as a flux in reducing the melting point of Alumina during the electrolytic process of producing Aluminum, and for making flux tablets to purify metal in foundries. It has an installed production capacity of 5,000 tons of Aluminium Fluoride per year.

Archit Organosys Limited is engaged in the business of dealing and manufacturing of chemicals. The Company's products include Mono Chloco Acetic Acid and Ethyle Acetate. The Company produces a range of organic chemicals, pigments, specialty derivatives, cosmetic products, adhesives and sealants. The Company's monochloroacetic acid and sodium monochloroacetate are used in the synthesis of various agricultural chemicals, cosmetic surfactants, oil drilling chemicals and plastic additives. The Company's Marval is a plant growth enhancer, which is made from organic plant waste. Marval contains natural trace elements, simple and complex sugars in a balanced form. Marval also contains phenolic compounds and cytokinins. The Auxins in Marval are naturally occurring plant growth hormones. The Company's coatings include AOL RUBBOCOAT and AOL ROOF & GUTTER SEALANTS. RubboCoat is a single component rapid drying paint. RubboCoat is used for vehicle underbody and roof tops.

Bharat Immunologicals and Biologicals Corporation Limited is an India-based biotechnology company. The Company manufactures and produces a range of pharmaceuticals products, such as Oral Polio Vaccines (OPV Vaccine), Zinc Tablet and Diarrhea Management Kit (Zinc Tablet + oral rehydration salts (ORS)). The Company's segments include Oral Polio Vaccine and Zinc Tablets. In vaccine segment, the Company manufactures oral polio vaccines (trivalent oral polio vaccine (tOPV) and bivalent oral polio vaccine (bOPV)). The Company manufactures and markets dispersible zinc tablet and diarrhea management kit in Pharmaceutical segment. The Company's manufacturing unit is located at Village Chola, Bulandshahr, Uttar Pradesh, India.

Link Pharma Chem Limited is an India-based chemical manufacturing company. The Company primarily offers TDP and TCSA. The Company's geographical segments include India and Outside India. The Company also offers organic intermediates. Its manufacturing facility is located at Nandesari, Baroda. The Company manufactures and exports multi range intermediates for pharmaceutical, agro industries and specialty chemicals. It is also engaged in custom synthesis/contract manufacturing for multistage synthesis for a range of companies. Its services also include development of multi-step pathways for organic synthesis, and refinement and optimization of existing synthetic methods. The Company's in-house testing laboratory has various facilities, such as high-performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) testing facilities, ultraviolet (UV) spectrophotometer testing facilities, Karl-Fisher instruments for moisture/water content measurement, and gas liquid chromatography (GLC) testing facilities.

Transgene Biotek Limited is an India-based biotechnology company. The Company operates transgene medical centers. The Company's segments include Diagnostic Services, CRO Services and API-DHA. Its portfolio of products includes oncology, auto-immunity, drug delivery and biogenerics. Its oncology products include TBL-0404, used for the treatment of metastatic liver cancer; TBL-0905, used for the treatment of metastatic breast cancer, and TBL-0306C, used for the treatment of colon cancer. Its auto-immunity products include TBL-1203HI, used for the treatment of human immunodeficiency virus (HIV), and TBL-1108MS, used for the treatment of multiple sclerosis. Its drug delivery products include TBL-1002OI, used for the treatment of oral delivery of insulin, and TBL-1004HI, used for the treatment of oral delivery of HIV drug. The Company's biogenerics products include Tacrolimus, Orlistat and docosahexaenoic acid (DHA).

MPL Plastics Limited manufactures thermoware products. The Company is also engaged in manufacturing tableware, kitchenware and other household articles, and toilet articles of plastics, including manufacture of vacuum flasks and other vacuum vessels. Its products include vacuum flasks, which consists of Armour Flask, Elite, Carolina Flask, Imagination Flask, Kool Pack Mark II and ICY Tot; Casseroles, including Orion, Convoy, Buffet, Cozee Ultra, Casino Ultra, Orion Gift Set, Pot Compact, Buffet Jr. Gift Set, Casino Ultra Gift Set and Convoy dlx; Tiffins, which consists of Vector, Mariner Junior, Brunch Maxx, Food Fun, Sentinel, Sheriff, Senator and Meal Mate; Water Bottles, which include Slim Gym, Bulls Eye, Kool Aqua, Kool Tickler, Cosmo, Kool Rider, Kool Lancer and Kool Magnum, and Water Jugs, which include Kool Twister, Kool Musafir and Kool Aquatic. Its manufacturing and operating divisions are located at Nagar Road, Village Shikrapur District, Pune, and Village Piparia, Silvassa.

Nikhil Adhesives Limited is an India-based multi-product company manufacturing, selling and exporting various types of polymer emulsions that are used for various applications. The Company offers polymeric emulsions adhesives, plasticizers and solvent-based adhesives. The Company's segments include Manufacturing of Adhesives & Emulsions, and Trading in Chemicals. The Company operates under two business segments: Branded Consumer Products and Industrial Products. It offers wood adhesives, construction chemicals and others under Branded Consumer Products segment, which are used by carpenters, printers, plumbers, mechanics, households, students and offices, among others. It offers industrial adhesives and synthetic resins, among others under Industrial Products segment, which caters to various industries, such as packaging, textiles, paints and leather. It has three manufacturing units located at Dahanu (Maharashtra), Silvassa (Dadra Nagar Haveli) and Dahej (Gujarat).

Multibase India Limited is engaged in the manufacture and marketing of rubber and plastics. The Company is engaged in manufacturing and selling of polypropylene compound, thermoplastic elastomer, silicon master batch and thermoplastic master batch. The Company's products include Silicon-Based Thermoplastics, TPSiV MultiflexSiE, Thermoplastic-Elastomer (TPE physically blends), Multiflex Triethylsilane (TES) (Styrene Ethylene Butylene Styrene (SEBS)/Styrenic Block Copolymers (SBCS) based) Multiflex Triethylamine (TEA), Masterbatch, Siloxane Masterbatch: Dow Corning MB Multibatch (including micro-talc), Thermoplastic Mineral Filled Polylefin Compound and Multipro (including micro-talc) Multiflex Thermoplastic Polyolefin (TPO). The Company produces a range of both commodity and specialty products, which are used in a range of applications in markets, such as automotive, personal care, personal hygiene, stationery, telecommunications and engineering polymers.

Royal Cushion Vinyl Products Limited (RCVPL) is an India-based company, which is engaged in manufacturing of poly vinyl chloride (PVC) products used for household, offices, shops, health club and automobiles, among others. The Company has developed a product for transport office and domestic applications. The Company manufactures PVC products, which include PVC laminated sheet/tiles and PVC leather cloth. The Company is engaged in the manufacturing of PVC vinyl floorings. It has developed Bus flooring, Orbit (approximately three millimeters) and Starlite with various color range.

Bloom Dekor Limited is an India-based manufacturer and exporter of decorative laminates. The Company manufactures and sells laminated sheets and wooden doors, frames and furniture. Its geographical segments include Domestic and Export. The Company's products include laminates, such as standard grade laminates, post forming laminates, compact laminates, sandwich laminates, cabinet liners, marker grade laminates, chalk grade laminates, translucent laminates, exterior laminate panels, backing laminates, translucent laminates, exterior laminate panels and chalk grade laminates, and doors sets, which include black label doors, green label doors and veneer doors. The Company's products are used in making marker boards, covering the surface of furniture, electrical switch boards, toilet cubicles, lockers, kitchen counter tops, vanity tops, cabinet doors, drawer fronts and desktops. The Company caters to both domestic and international markets.

Kkalpana Industries (India) Limited is engaged in the business of polymer componder. The Company is engaged in the business of polyethylene (PE) compound, Polyvinyl Chloride (PVC) compound and others. The Company operates in manufacturing and selling of PVC and XLPE compound segment. The Company's product range includes PE compounds, including Silane Grafted XLPE Compounds, PE Black Sheating/Jacketing, and semi conductive compounds thermoplastic; PVC compounds, including insulation and sheating; Filled Compound, including Calcium carbonate in PE, Talc filled in PE and Calcium Carbonate in PP; Engineered Thermo Plastics, including Talc Filled PP, and Mineral & Glass filled Thermoplastic; Footwear Compounds, including PVC, TPR, PVC/NBR and EVA; Pipe Compounds, including PEX (PEX b) and rigid PVC, and Ink, including printing inks, Flexo and gravure, and MASTERBATCH, including Colour Masterbatches, white Masterbatches, performance enhancer masterbatches and colour rotomoulding powder.

Kriti Industries (India) Limited is engaged in the pipes business. The Company operates under Plastic segment in over four verticals, such as agriculture, building products, micro irrigation and infrastructure. Its agriculture products include rigid polyvinyl chloride (RPVC) pipe and fittings, casing pipe, polyethylene (PE) coils, sprinkler systems, submersible pipe, suction and garden pipe. Its building products include soil waste rainwater (SWR) drainage pipe and fittings, chlorinated polyvinyl chloride (CPVC) and plumb pipe and fittings, and garden pipe. Its micro irrigation products include micro irrigation lateral (inline and online), sprinkler systems, and RPVC pipe and fittings. Its infrastructure products include RPVC ring fit pipe (elastomeric) and fittings, high-density PE (HDPE) and medium-density PE (MDPE) pipes and fittings, permanently lubricated (PLB) telecom duct and micro duct. Kriti Auto & Engineering Plastics Private Limited is the subsidiary of the Company.

Rishiroop Limited, formerly Puneet Resins Limited, is engaged in the manufacturing of polymer blends for the medium and small-scale sector. The Company operates through Polymers & Compounds segment. The Company has two geographical segments: India and Outside India. The Company's products include nitrile rubber (NBR)/polyvinyl chloride (PVC) blend, PVC-NBR blend and Synthetic Rubber. The Company also offers a vulcanized vegetable oil, Vulcanol, which offers a range of grades that can perform as processing aids, extenders or as a plasticizer for rubber base formulations. Its Vulcanol is used in printing rollers and blankets, eraser compounds, rubberized fabric and rubber threads. Its Vinoprene/Vinoplast are a group of NBR/PVC blends. Its VinoPrene and Vinoplast are used in petroleum hoses, liquid petroleum gas (LPG) house, cable sheeting, shoe sales, automotive parts and printing rolls.

Scanpoint Geomatics Limited (SGL) is an India-based information technology (IT) company. The Company is engaged in providing end-to-end geomatics products and services. It is a business solution provider specializing in the areas of geographical information system (GIS), image processing (IP), global positioning system (GPS), ground penetration radar (GPR), photogrammetry (PG), and location-based services (LBS) and surveys. Its products include Integrated GIS and Image Processing Software, a software that provides a scalable geospatial platform for desktop, enterprise, mobile, Web and the cloud, and Q-Pad, a mobile GIS application that works on Windows Compact Edition (CE)-based hand held device. It specializes in the development of enterprise software and applications for geomatics. It provides customized solutions for urban planning, utilities, land use, disaster management, natural resources, land information system, forestry, agriculture, power and vehicle tracking system.
Matra Kaushal Enterprise Limited is India-based company. The Company is engaged in electrical industry which is into manufacture of voltage stabilizers under the brand unistab.

Fenoplast Limited is an India-based company engaged in manufacturing of polyvinyl chloride (PVC) film and PVC leather cloth. The Company operates through two segments: PVC Leather Cloth and PVC Film. Its PVC film is used in the pharma application for tablets packaging, healthcare products packaging and is gaining acceptance in the packaging of consumer goods, such as shaving products, tooth brushes, batteries, tools and toys. Its PVC leather cloth is used for car upholstery, motor cycle seat covers, auto rickshaw hoods and seats, tractors, trucks and buses. It is also used for making ladies bags and footwear. Its PVC film products include Day Life, Day Might-H and Day Might-M, Day Mettle and Day Perle. It offers Day shield, a polyvinylidene chloride (PVDC) coated PVC film, which is used for hygroscopic and sensitive pharma and food packaging.

Bright Brothers Limited is engaged in the business of manufacturing injection molded plastic products for supplies to original equipment manufacturers for consumer durable industry. The Company operates through process plastics segment. It markets its own products under Brite brand for material handling crates. It is involved in the sale of plastic components, hair care and beauty products, and molds. It has hair care division, which markets hair brushes and beauty products under DIVO brand. Its products and services include Consumer Durable Parts & Systems; Crates, Bins and Containers; Hair Care Products; Tooth Brush Handles; Tool and Die making; Painting; Automotive Parts and Systems, and Pallets. Its plants are located at Faridabad, Haryana; Bhimtal, Nainital, Uttarakhand, and Dehradun, Uttarakhand. Its Consumer Durable unit is involved in manufacturing and supplying washing machines, refrigerators, air conditioners, water purifiers, and other residential and commercial products.

Valiant Communications Limited manufactures telecom transmission and communication equipment and solutions. The Company offers products, such as global positioning system (GPS) G.811 primary reference clocks; GPS, PTP IEEE-1588v2 Grandmaster and PTP Slave Clocks; E1 PDH multiplexer; Teleprotection; Internet protocol (IP) multiplexer; packet-optical transport equipment; time-division multiplexing (TDM) over IP/TDM over Ethernet/TDM over Packet (IEEE-1588v2); E1/T1/E3/DS3/T3 over Ethernet/IP (TDM over IP) converters; fiber optic transmission solutions; APS (1+1) automatic protection and failover switching; digital access cross connect switches (DXC); groomer (Hi-Z non-intrusive monitoring)-E1, T1 and STM-1; E1 and T1 echo cancellers and voice quality enhancement (VQE), and products, converters and patch panels, among others. Its solutions include oil and gas solutions, railways and metro rail communication solutions, airport communication solutions and mobile backhaul.

Rajeswari Infrastructure Limited is an India-based company engaged in civil construction. The Company is engaged in Residential Construction, Rental Serviced Apartments and Printing. The Company's segments include Construction Division, Service Apartment Division and Printing Division.

Atlanta Devcon Limited is an India-based company engaged in activities relating to infrastructural projects. The Company's infrastructural projects include constructions for residential and commercial premises. The Company has not carried any commercial activities.

Dion Global Solutions Limited is an India-based financial technology company. The Company designs, develops and supports integrated software solutions for financial institutions worldwide. It offers software solutions for the retail and institutional banks, asset and wealth management firms, stockbrokers, financial advisers, traders, end investors and other financial services providers. It offers various financial software solutions, such as wealth management solutions for investment management; order management; analytics asset administration; end-to-end retail and institutional trading solutions for online trading; mutual fund distributions; investment portfolio tracking and content; data and Web solutions for the financial service companies. It offers NOVA, a post trade processing solution for institutional and retail investment banks and stock brokers. Its research and information services comprises of business and strategy research, which enables users to take business decisions.

Stylam Industries Ltd is principally engaged in offering laminates. The Company's products include high pressure laminates, door skins, adhesives, VIOLAM-decorative laminates, FASCIA-exterior cladding, WALKON-exterior floor boards and quality credentials. Its high pressure decorative laminates constitute decorative design papers and absorbent kraft paper impregnated with melamine and phenolic resins respectively. Its products also include compact laminates, which are formulated with celluloid fibers impregnated with thermosetting resins; industrial laminates, including drill and entry boards in both phenolic and melamine faced surfaces; unicore laminates, which can be used for desks, doors, counter-tops, table-tops and drawers; metallic laminates that are manufactured with metalized aluminum foil; fire retardant laminates manufactured by impregnating papers with phenolic resin having imported fire retardant chemicals in its composition, and post forming laminates, among others.

NPR Finance Limited is a non-banking non-deposit taking company. The Company's segments are Financial, Money Changing, Wind Power Generation and Real Estate. Its financial activities include granting of loan covered by hypothecation agreements, inter corporate deposits, and shares and securities. The Company offers finance to used commercial vehicles and cars. The Company's money changing operations include sale of all major currencies and travelers checks; encashment of all major currencies and travelers checks catering to public non-resident Indians (NRI), foreigners, banks and others; appointment of franchisees to carry on restricted money changing activity facilitating availability of encashment facilities for the inbound travelers; western union money transfer, and sale of banking through mobile (BTM) cards. The Company has setup approximately two wind turbine generators of 1.25 megawatts capacity each at Dhule and Sangli in the state of Maharashtra for generation of wind Power.

Nile Limited is engaged in the manufacturing of lead and lead alloys. The Lead Division produces lead and lead alloys. The Company’s products include Lead Antimonial alloys, Lead Selenium alloys, Lead Calcium alloys and Lead Tin alloys. The Company's secondary lead recycling plants are located in Panthangi Village, Choutuppal Mandal Nalgonda District, Telangana, and APIIC Industrial Park, Gajulamandyam Village, Renigunta Mandal, Tirupati, Chittoor District, Andhra Pradesh. The Company's two-megawatt wind farm is located at Ramagiri, Ananthapur district, Andhra Pradesh. The Company’s Lead recycling capacity is 82,000 tons per annum. The Company's product range includes pure lead 99.97% purity, lead antimonial alloys, lead selenium alloys, lead calcium alloys and lead tin alloys. The Company caters to the lead acid battery manufacturers, polyvinyl chloride (PVC) stabilizers and lead oxide manufacturers.

Kreon Finnancial Services Limited is an India-based non-banking finance company. The Company is engaged primarily into financing activities along with investing in to long term and short term projects, securities, debts related instruments and others. The Company serves various industries, which include financial service and investment service.

Kisan Mouldings Limited is a plastics company. The Company is engaged in the manufacturing of polyvinyl chloride (PVC) pipes, fittings and allied products. The Company's segments include Pipes and Fittings, and Moulded Furniture. The Company's pipes are used for water supply, sanitation, sewerage, construction, cable ducting, drinking water, tube wells, submersible pumps and various polymer products. The Company is also engaged in manufacturing of molded furniture. The Company's products include Free Flow uPVC Plumbing System; Soil, Waste & Rain Water (S.W.R.) uPVC Drainage Systems; PERMAFIT SWR Pipes & Fittings; Drip Irrigation Systems; Sprinkler Irrigation Systems; Kisan Barish Rain Water Harvesting System; Underground Drainage Pipes; PLB Duct Pipes; Circle Ark Round Conduit Pipes & Fittings; New Generation KML Classic Submersible Pipe; High-Density Polyethylene (HDPE) Pipes, and Conduit Fittings. The Company offers furniture, solvent cement, rubber lubricants and ghamelas.

Moongipa Capital Finance Limited is an India-based finance and investment company. The Company is engaged in the business of financing activities and provides consumer loans and micro-finance to its client.

Geefcee Finance Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in providing other financial activities. The Company offers inter-corporate deposits, leasing, hire purchasing, bills discounting, investment, merchant banking, trading and corporate advisory services.

EPIC Energy Limited is an India-based company, which is principally engaged in the manufacturing of energy saver and renewable energy saving appliances. The Company operates in two segments, which include power conditioners & savers, and renewable energy & energy saving appliances. The Company offers its equipment with global system for mobile communication (GSM) and general packet radio service (GPRS) capabilities.

Tinna Rubber And Infrastructure Limited is engaged in the conversion of used tires into Crumb Rubber and Steel wires. The Company's main products/services include Crumb Rubber Modifier, Steel Scrap and Crumb Rubber. The Company's segments include Allied Road Products, which consists of Crumb Rubber, Crumb Rubber Modifier (CRM), Modified Bitumen, and Bitumen Emulsion and Other Road Products; Trading and Agro Products, which includes trading of wheat, maize soyabean, soya de-oiled cake (doc) and other agro products, and Warehousing and Cargo Handling, which includes providing services of warehousing and custom house agent. It manufactures various products, such as CRM, Crumb Rubber Modified Bitumen, Polymer Modified Bitumen, Reclaimed Rubber/Ultra-fine Crumb Rubber compound, Cut Wire Shots, Steel Scrap Bale and Steel Wire Cleaned. The Company's manufacturing units are located at Haryana, Maharashtra, West Bengal, Tamil Nadu and Himachal Pradesh.

MARG Limited is engaged in business of constructions and real estate development business. The Company operates through four segments: EPC, which provides integrated design, engineering, material procurement, field services and construction and project management services for infrastructure sector and real estate projects; Urban Infrastructure Development, which includes the special economic zone (SEZ), MARG Swarnabhoomi, MARG Properties Limited and other residential projects; Port and Logistics, which includes the MARG Karaikal Port, which is a private port engaged in the development and operation of the port in Karaikal and MARG Logistics, which is a subsidiary of the Company, offering total integrated logistics services to the EXIM Customers of Karaikal Port, and Leasing, which includes MARG Junction Mall, which is under construction, proposing to lease the commercial spaces for business, leisure and entertainment, and Hotel, and the leasing of Digital Zones.

Company: NCL Research and Financial Services Ltd
Business Description: NCL Research & Financial Services Limited is an India-based non-banking financial company (NBFC). The Company is into the business of finance and investments, and is carrying business of investment in shares and securities, as well as financing activities. The Company is also engaged in the trading of textile products. The Company focuses on carrying the business of advancing loans and investing in quoted and unquoted securities.

Ladderup Finance Limited is a mid-market investment bank. The Company is engaged in providing one-stop financial advisory and fund raising solutions in investment banking; capital markets; wealth management; project finance, and growth stage investing. The Company's segments include Investment & Trading Activities, Consultancy Services, Finance Activities, and Investment Advisory Services. The Company manages proprietary fund primarily in equity, equity linked instruments and growth stage opportunities. The Company provides a spectrum of business and corporate financing for needs, such as growth capital, private equity fund raising, expansion capital, pre-initial public offering (IPO) financing and buy-backs. The Company offers financial products, such as project financing, working capital, corporate loans, restructuring, structured finance and capital market financing. It also offers wealth management and investment advisory services.

Sturdy Industries Limited is an India-based company engaged in manufacturing and supplying aluminum alloy conductors (AAC), all aluminum alloy conductors (AAAC) and aluminum conductor steel-reinforced (ACSR) conductors, aerial bundled cables (ABC), aluminum composite panels with brand SUNBOND, sprinkler and drip irrigation systems, high density polyethylene (HDPE) and polyvinyl chloride (PVC) pipes, permanent lubricant HDPE ducts and plastic water storage Tanks. The Company's segments include Plastic Pipes & Irrigations, Aluminum Division, Trading and Others. Its SUNBOND aluminum composite panels are available in a range of wood, marble, granite, stone, mirror, brush finish and other special patterns. Its SUNBOND Aluminum Composite Panels are folded, curved, shaped, punched and drilled using conventional tools and equipment used in wood and metal fabrications. Its plants are located in Solan, Himachal Pradesh; Derabassi, Punjab; Parwanoo, Himachal Pradesh, and Kamrup, Assam.

Akar Auto Industries Limited, formerly Akar Tools Limited, is an India-based company, which is engaged in the manufacturing of automotive components, such as hand tools and commercial automotive forgings, and leaf springs business. The Company's segments include Hand Tools and Leaf Spring. The Company's Hand Tools include Spanner/Wrenches, Automotive/Working Tools, Plumbing Tools, Electrical and Electronics Tools, Striking Tools, Lubricating Tools, Tool Apron and Hand Truck. Its tool kits include automotive tool kits and non-automotive tool kits. Its forging includes Forging-Automotive, such as Automotive Levers, Automotive Shafts, Automotive Gear Blanks and Automotive Various Other Forgings, and Forging-Non-Automotive, such as Non-Automotive Shaft and Non-Automotive Various Other Forgings. Its Leaf Springs include Multi Leaf Spring, such as Bogie Type, Progressive Type, Single stage, two stages; Parabolic Leaf Spring and Air Links, such as Air Links Z springs and Air Links Heavy.

Eco Recycling Limited is an e-waste management company. The Company is engaged in waste collection, treatment and disposal activities. Its services include recycling and recovery, reverse logistics, data destruction (onsite and offsite), asset management, lamp recycling (onsite and offsite) and extended producers responsibility (EPR) implementation. Its recycling and recovery process includes sourcing and collection, sorting and grading, dismantling, shredding and disposal. It facilitates disposal of fused lamps to protect environment. It owns a fleet of trucks and containers, as well as tie-ups with logistics companies to support the initiative of returning back the basic commodities to the respective industries without further withdrawal from mines. It provides an integrated solution for e-waste management to multinational companies, bulk consumers, original equipment manufacturers, government departments, households, philanthropy organizations and educational institutions.

Venus Universal Ltd. has designed a portal. The portal contains the details of eye Surgeons and eye banks all over the world. As of March 31, 2010, the Company had no segments and had no subsidiary company.

BNR Udyog Limited offers Investment, Business Support Service and Medical Transcription/Information technology (IT)/ Information Technology enabled Services (ITES). The Company's segments include Medical Transcription, Business Support, and Finance & Others Activities. The Company's geography segments consist of United States of America (USA) and India. The Company's services categories include E-Governance, Healthcare Services, IT and ITES, Document Scanning, Document Conversion-Digitization, Data Processing, Database Management Services and Construction. The Company's services include call centers, electronic publishing, medical transcription, data centers, indexing, optical character recognition (OCR), intelligent character recognition (ICR), optical mark reader (OMR) scanning of documents and data entry. The Company offers dictation capture, archival, transcription, document management and delivery, coding, and billing and revenue cycle management.

Raminfo Limited is an India-based information technology company. The Company is engaged in computer programming, consultancy and related activities. The Company provides technology solutions for industries, such as government, healthcare, banking, tourism, logistics and defense. It offers e-Governance solutions, core banking products and defense solutions. It provides e-Governance solutions for various industries, such as housing, transport, social welfare and electricity. Its core banking products suite includes SmartBanker, which is a Web-based and centralized product platform for corporate and retail banking automation. The SmartBanker core banking products suite includes e-SmartBanker, SmartALM and SmartInventory. The Company provides a range of services for the defense, including customized knowledge management solutions, development of user-specific decision support systems and simulation, and payroll and accounting solutions.

United Credit Limited is an India-based non-banking financial services company. The Company is engaged in the business of credit granting and renting property. The Company is divided operationally into the lease, hire purchase, consumer financing, investment and capital market operation.

Catvision Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in the manufacturing and sale of community antenna television (CATV)/satellite master antenna television (SMATV) and Internet Protocol television (IPTV) systems. The Company is also engaged in the operation and maintenance of CATV Networks, and Channel marketing. The Company operates in two divisions: CATV Equipment & Systems Division, and Hotel Systems & Services Division. The CATV Equipment & Systems Division sells electronic equipment to cable television operators for use in their cable television network. The Company offers TRINETRA, which is a digital headend system. The Hotel Systems & Services Division primarily addresses the hospitality sector, providing solutions in Cable television and IPTV. The Company organizes and distributes channels in India through various platforms, such as cable, IPTV, Mobile television and other digital platforms across homes and commercial establishments.

India Gelatine & Chemicals Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in the manufacture of chemical products, such as Ossien, Gelatine and Di-Calcium Phosphate (DCP). The Company focuses mainly on the export markets. The Company's customers include pharmaceutical/neutraceutical users in the form of hard gelatin capsules (HGC) and soft shell capsules (SSC). The Company's products include Edible Gelatine, Photographic Gelatine, Technical Gelatine and Pharmaceutical Gelatine. The Company uses various raw materials, such as crushed bones, lime and hydrochloric acid, for the production of its products. The Company offers its products to various industries, including marshmallows, ice creams, food, pharmaceutical and photographic industries.

Paragon Finance Limited is a non-banking financial company (NBFC). The Company is engaged in providing loan against security of vehicles, investment in shares and mutual fund, and finance business concerns, individuals and companies, among others. Its principal business activities include interest on loan and income from investment in shares. It is an automobile finance, real estate projects development, construction and planner, investment company. The Company has operations in Jharkhand, Bihar, West Bengal and Bangalore.

Esha Media Research Limited, formerly Laser Dot Limited, is engaged in providing market research services. The Company's services include television content monitoring, Webpage-video platform, and transcription and translations. It monitors over 140 channels in various Indian languages, such as Tamil, Malayalam, Kannada, Telugu, Gujarati, Bengali, Hindi, Marathi and English that broadcast across the country. Its television media monitoring services include Webpage services for companies to track clips relating to their company or competition, public relations (PR) hub platform for multi-client public relations agencies, a listing of various commercials aired based on various parameters, and transcription/translation services. Its premium services include information monitoring research and analysis, stock market vigilance monitoring, television monitoring intelligence report, corporate image monitoring and issue monitoring.

National Plastic Technologies Limited is engaged in offering plastic molded components. The Company offers injection molded plastic products. The Company has manufacturing plants at Chennai, Sriperumbudur, Puducherry and Himachal Pradesh. The Company caters to automotive industry, consumer electronics and information technology (IT) peripherals sectors.

Lead Financial Services Limited is an India-based non-banking financial company. The Company is engaged in the business of interest income, sale of shares, dividend income and long term capital gain. The Company offers various types of loans to its customers. It also offers a range of financial services to its clients.

Artefact Projects Limited is engaged in architectural and engineering activities and related technical consultancy (project management consultancy services). The Company's segments include Project Management Consultancy (PMC) segment, which is engaged in designing, consultancy, and operation and maintenance of projects; Engineering, Procurement and Construction (EPC) segment, which is engaged in providing EPC services, and Mining segment, which consists of mining contract services and trading of minerals. It offers services for highway and road sector, overseas project services and knowledge process outsourcing (KPO), townships/buildings, airports, urban development sector and structural engineering services. Its services for highway and road sector include master plans, surveys, investigation, engineering drawings, cost estimates, environment impact study, institutional arrangements, implementation structure construction and contract management till project completion.
Charms Industries Limited is a full fledge money changer (FFMC). The Company operates primarily in India.

India Infraspace Limited is an India-based integrated construction, metal manufacturing, infrastructure development and management company. The Company's segments include Steel Trading, Information Technology Services, Trading of Goods, Infrastructure & Allied Services, and Others. The Company focuses on executing construction and infrastructure projects in various sectors, such as water and waste water, transportation, irrigation, industrial construction and parks (including special economic zones (SEZs)), power transmission and distribution, and residential, commercial and retail property in and around the state of Gujarat. The Company is also engaged in the business of trading of various steel products and electronic products. In addition, the Company offers various information technology enabled services. Shaurya Casting Private Limited is the wholly owned subsidiary of the Company.

Shriram Asset Management Company Limited is engaged in providing financial and related services. The Company is a part of the Shriram Group, which provides financial services, such as commercial vehicle, financial services, consumer finance, life and general insurance, stock broking and chit funds, and distributes financial products.

Hasti Finance Limited is a non banking financial company (NBFC). The Company is engaged in financing activities. The Company is focused on personal loan and business finance. The Company offers loans to its customers, including both retail customers and corporate customers. The Company is engaged in providing personal loan, as well as gold loan.

Sungold Capital Limited is a non-banking finance company (NBFC). The Company is engaged in other financial services activities except insurance and pension. The Company operates through various segments, including Entrainment, Software Development and NBFC Activities. It provides solutions for situations, such as initial funding requirements of a project, mezzanine financing, project financing, bridge financing, short term and long term working capital requirements. The Company offers fund for film production, distribution and exhibition, for purchasing of satellite right of movies and daily shows. The Company provides finance for musical event, album, rock band, short films and daily soaps. It offers short to medium term loans at various stages of project implementation, including the seed-stage funding or as a last mile funding to facilitate completion of the project. It also provides terms loans against property (residential, commercial and industrial) and terms loans for hire.

Vardhman Concrete Limited is an India-based infrastructure company. The Company is engaged in construction activity. The Company operates through civil construction and allied activities segment. The Company's plant is located in Lohop Village, Khalapur Taluka, Raigad District, Maharashtra.

Polylink Polymers (India) Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in compounding of various types of polymers. The Company is manufacturing various compounds of power cable, telephone cable and engineering plastics. It supplies compounds on both national and international market. Its products include engineering polymer; wire and cable compounds; special compounds for cable accessories; addictive master batches, and cross-linked polyethylene (PE) compounds for pipes. Its engineering polymer includes filled polypropylene (PP) compounds for garden furniture, filled PP compounds for other engineering applications and filled nylon compounds for plastic application. Its wire and cable compounds include power cable and telecommunication cable. Its special compounds for cable accessories include silane grafted polyethylene compounds, anti-tracking red moldings compounds, anti-tracking extrusion compounds and semiconducting expendable compounds.

Esaar (India) Limited is an India-based non-banking financial company (NBFC). The Company is engaged in financial, investment and share trading, and commodity trading. The Company operates through two segments: Finance & Securities and Trading. The Company offers a range of retail and corporate products and services. The Company offers various categories of loans and advances.

Mahan Industries Limited is an India-based non-banking financial company. The Company is involved in the business of finance and investment. The Company invests in middle market companies. The Company provides direct equity capital, and debt and loans. The Company may also invest in public companies that are thinly traded and may acquire investments in the secondary market.

Maruti Infrastructure Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in the infrastructure business. The Company is engaged in the business of construction contracts. The Company's projects include Anand Mangal Party Plot; Aaron Elegance; Ward Office Building; Reptile House in Kankaria Zoo; Club House & Infrastructure Facility; Shubh Apartment, 2 BHK Affordable House; Temporary Road Filling, Excavation; Excavation Work, ONGC Petro Additions Ltd.; 25 Lac Litre Sump & Pump House; Terminal Sweage Pumping Station; Renovation of Mechanical Dept.; Administration Building; Residential Rooms& Health Club; Denim Loom Shed & H-Plant; Civil Works of Data Centre & Office Building: GWRDC-Deesa; Rebuilding Bridge No.-318; Renovation of Office Building-Nagarpalika; 100 Lac Litre U.G. Sump at Telav Head Works, and Aaron Residency.

APEX Buildsys Limited provides various engineering and design solutions. The Company's segments include Metal products & Allied Services, and Entertainment/Cineplex. The Company offers various building solutions, including civil, design, fabrications, logistics and executions. The Company offers pre-engineered buildings (PEB) for warehouse and industrial buildings, railway and airports, electrical and transformers, manufacturing, oil and gas, and others. The Company also offers heavy fabrication and turnkey projects. The Company's Engineering division is engaged in internal, as well as outsourced projects, using its technical software. The Company's manufacturing facilities are located at Pantnagar, Uttaranchal, and Nagpur, Maharashtra in India. The Company is engaged in the construction of a range of steel and civil buildings.

StarCom Information Technology Limited is engaged in the business of solution provider in the data quality, business intelligence and data analytics space. The Company offers test, measurement and embedded solutions for educational sector. It is also engaged in the sale of non-customized data analytic software products. The Company operates through two business segments: Test, Measurement and Embedded Solution for Educational Sector, and Data Quality, Statistical and Analytics Softwares. The Company's data quality solutions include data cleansing, data profiling, data de-duping and data monitoring. Its enterprise analytics solutions include data sourcing, report/dashboard designing, on-demand/scheduled delivery and delivery channels. The Company offers application deployment models, including cloud application deployment and on premise deployment, supporting either multi databases or multi-tenancy environments, to fit the needs of business.

Cat Technologies Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in the business of medical transcription, training software development and consulting services. The Company's services include information technology (IT) infrastructure, open source development, IT staffing, three dimensional (3D) animation and Web development. The Company's software development services include mobile Web development, .Net Development, SharePoint development, Flash development, Java development, Delphi development, ColdFusion development, DotNetNuke development, Perl development, Visual Foxpro development, game development and search engine optimization. Its IT infrastructure services include infrastructure management, virtualization services, end user computing, and IT outsourcing and offshoring. The Company's 3D animation services include 3D aeronautical engineering, stenting, 3D operation room, architectural residential villa and air shooter game.

Prithvi Exchange (India) Ltd, formerly Prithvi Softech Limited, is an India-based company, which is engaged in the foreign exchange business. The Company operates through the trading of foreign currencies segment. The Company deals in all tradable foreign currencies, traveler checks, drafts and swift transfers. The Company operates under the brand name of Prithvi Exchange. Prithvi Exchange offers a range of foreign exchange services, such as Money Changing and Money Transfer Services. Prithvi Exchange receives money transfer sent through Western Union Money Transfer, Money Gram and Xpress Money. Prithvi Exchange also serves its customers by issuing International Travel Insurance. It offers foreign exchange for various purposes, including private visit, business visit, emigration, employment, studies abroad, medical and remittance of tour operators. The Company has approximately 16 branches in the states of Tamil Nadu, Karnataka, Andhra Pradesh, Gujarat and Maharashtra.

Menon Pistons Limited is engaged in manufacturing of auto components, such as pistons, gudgeon pins and rings required for commercial and passenger vehicles. The Company's product range consists of piston assemblies for an array of features catering to various applications, such as heavy duty diesel engines for power generation/off highway vehicles/gas engines; heavy/medium/light commercial vehicles with diesel engines; passenger car (diesel and gasoline) engines, and bi-wheeler (four stroke)/small engine applications. The Company develops and produces pistons with diameters ranging from 130 millimeters to 190 millimeters featuring single alfin and dual alfin gravity die cast pistons. Its products include 1 MW Piston, 140 mm dia BEML Piston, Articulated Piston, Cooled Gallery Cut Section, TATA 497 Euro II Piston, TATA 4SP Euro III Piston and Kirloskar Copeland Pistons. The Company's plants are located at Kolhapur and Sangli.

Silicon Valley Infotech Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in sale of shares. The Company is involved in the business of granting loans and advances, and investment in shares and securities. The Company is involved in non-banking financial companies (NBFC) activities and financial management services. The Company focuses on NBFC activities, including financing, inter-corporate investments and capital market activities.

Kachchh Minerals Limited is an India-based company, which caters to the minerals processing segment through extraction of various types of silica sand, china clay and mineral raw material, among others. The Company's minerals are sold as raw materials or sold after processing.

Oriental Veneer Products Limited is engaged in the manufacturing of wood-based resin impregnated densified laminated boards. The Company is engaged in the manufacturing, buying and selling of various types of Recron, Seat and Bearth, and Compreg Boards. The Company is also engaged in the trading of timber woods, ferrous and non-ferrous metals, casting tools, slabs, rods, section flates, and other ferrous and non-ferrous products. It also offers Foldable Mattress, Recron Wadding, Recron Densified Thermal Bonded Blocks and Polyster Staples Fibers. The Company offers acosonic solutions, which provide design solutions for walls and ceilings with a focus on architectural acoustics, audio-visual and noise/vibration. Its products include Phenolic Resins, Laminated Wood, Shuttering Plates, Bonded Blocks, Sound Insulation Floor, Mobile Toilet, Head Stock and End Wall. Its products are used in various applications, including railways, automotive, consumer and industrial engineering industry.

Popular Estate Management Limited is an India-based real estate company. The Company is engaged in construction and engineering activities, among others. The Company focuses on real estate and all other infrastructure related projects. The Company has developed various residential and commercial projects, including plotting for the residential localities in Ahmedabad.

CCL International Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in the business of construction. The Company is involved in infrastructure division/civil engineering works, including work contract operations and land/ plots/residential units commercial complex, and trading division, including ferrous and non-ferrous items. The Company's business divisions include CHIRAWA COMMODITIES and CRETEROADS CONSTRUCTION. The CHIRAWA COMMODITIES division is focused on trading of iron and steel, and cotton fabrics, among others. The Company's product range includes angle, beams, channel, thermo mechanically treated (TMT), and hot rolled (HR) coil and sheets. The CRETEROADS CONSTRUCTION division focuses on the construction/re-construction and designing/re-designing of new, as well as existing roads and bridges. It utilizes EvoCrete, a formulation for modification of soil in order to make it appropriate for road construction.

Globus Corpooration Limited is an India-based company engaged in providing cables and conductors. The Company operates through two segments: Manufacturing Activity (Power Conductor Cables) and Trading activities. The Company's plant is located at Medak, Telangana. The Company has an installed capacity of approximately 5,000 metric tons of power conductors/cables.
Genus Commu-Trade Limited is an India-based company. The Company is engaged in commercial trading and distribution.

Zenotech Laboratories Limited (Zenotech) is an India-based pharmaceutical company. The Company is engaged in a business of manufacture and trading of pharmaceuticals products. The Company is a pharmaceutical specialty generic injectables company engaged in the area of manufacturing bio-technology products. The Company's injectables product portfolio primarily serves niche therapy areas like oncology and anesthesiology. The Company manufactures products such as granulocyte-colony stimulating factor (GCSF) and Granulocyte-macrophage colony-stimulating factor (GMCSF). The Company operates in India.

Adinath Exim Resources Limited is an India-based non-banking financial company. The Company is engaged in the business of financing and investment. The Company is involved in the finance activity having mainly the interest income and bill discounting income. The Company's services include financing in various lease operations, and carrying on the business of exploration and production of coal bed methane, and oil and gas.

TCFC Finance Limited is a non-banking finance company. The Company is engaged in the business of finance and investments, and trading in shares, mutual funds, bonds and securities, among others. The Company is also engaged in the business of investments in equity, debt, mutual funds and real estate, among others. The Company is involved in trading of securities in equity, both in the cash and future segments, and also participates in the initial public offers of various companies. The Company also invests in mutual funds.

Integrated Hitech Limited is an India-based company engaged in software/Web development. The Company is involved in the development of various software and services for e-filing of corporate statutory tax returns and developing the existing software. The Company is focused on developing e-filing system for goods and services tax (GST) and e-record system for healthcare. The Company's subsidiaries include lntegrated Hitech Singapore Pte. Ltd. and lntegrated Hitech (America) Corporation.

Intense Technologies Limited offers computer programming, consultancy and related activities. The Company's operations relates to software product development, solutions and related services. The Company's UniServe NXT is a platform for application development and deployment to manage business agility of enterprises. The Company's solutions include Customer Onboarding, Customer Communications Management, B2B Customer Experience, Telecom Expense Management, Compliance Driven Onboarding, Pre-bill Audit Management, Customer Identity Management, Customer Order Management and Digital Customer Experience. Its UniServe Order Assure streamlines users' order management systems to help with product launches. Its UniServe STEM provides a centralized view of telecom expenses across multiple lines of business. Its UniServe Onboard is an end-to-end rules-driven onboarding solution that ensures compliance with various global and local regulatory frameworks throughout the entire customer lifecycle.

HB Portfolio Limited is an India-based holding company, which deals in securities and other financial assets. The Company's principal business activity is to undertake financial services, investing and dealing in various kinds of securities. The Company is engaged in investment in securities, including equity shares, preference shares and mutual funds, which involves macroeconomic risks, investee company specific risks, market wide liquidity risks and execution risks relating to the Company/its intermediaries. The Company's subsidiaries include HB Corporate Services Limited and HB Securities Limited.

Commex Technology Limited provides technology and consulting service in capital and commodities market space. The Company operates through software development segment. It is engaged in computer and related activities. Its products are exchange solutions suite and broking solution suite. Its exchange solutions suite product includes X match, which manages operations necessary for an exchange; X trade, which provides real time trading solution; X act, a browser-based clearing and settlement system, and X view, which is a browser online surveillance system. Its broking solution suite product has X boss, offering functionality for mid and back office operations and integrates with existing other application for external data interface and continues to work towards providing solutions to all the concerned areas. Its services include custom application development, application management, package implementation, onsite consultancy, offshore outsourcing and information technology consulting.

SoftSol India Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in computer programming, consultancy and related activities. The Company offers various services, including Enterprise Modernization, such as Power Builder, Mainframe and Oracle forms; Testing Services; Custom Application Development; Cloud Computing Services; SalesForce Customer relationship management (CRM) Services; Stategic Consulting, and Remote Infrastructure Management. Its products include IntelliCourt Case Management, which is a case management system that coordinates the efforts of all roles in the process of justice; Corporate Investigations, which manages human resource (HR) and corporate loss investigations; BUGFAST, which is a test automation solution designed specifically for business teams to verify that software meets their business requirements, and ModernizeNow PowerBuilder Migration, which is a no obligation online tool that converts PowerBuilder application to either Java or .NET.

Virinchi Limited, formerly Virinchi Technologies Limited, is an information technology (IT) products and services company. The Company is engaged in software development and research. The Company's segments include Software Product, Software Services, IT Enabled, and Infrastructure and Real Estate Services. The Company's products and solutions include QFund, Enterprise Enabler, FairShare, Vendor Relations Enabler, Virinchi Manufacturing, eTendering, eLogistics, iAcquisto, Catalog Manager, Online Auction, eSales, Active, TrakPORT, Case Trail and Language Processor. The Company offers various services, including application development, data warehousing, Web services, enterprise application integration practice (EAI), testing services, maintenance and support practice, packaged development services, managed services and data center services. QFund provides Web-based point of sale (PoS) solution capable of handling various short-term finance transactions.

Saven Technologies Limited is engaged in the software development and services. The Company's principal business activities include computer programming, consultancy and related activities. The Company offers a range of software services from end-to-end development of new software and Web solutions, enterprise application services, to re-engineering and enhancement of legacy applications, application integration and ongoing maintenance.

Avantel Limited is engaged in the business of manufacturing telecom products and provides related customer support services. The Company operates through electronics and communication segment. The Company caters to both domestic and international markets. It specializes in integrating technologies related to wireless front-end, satellite communication, embedded systems, signal processing, network management and software development. The Company offers wireless, Satcom products, software solutions and services. The Company offers end-to-end solutions for Indian National Satellite System (INSAT)-based mobile satellite services. Its wireless products include radar subsystems, radios and radio frequency (RF) subsystems. It offers software solutions for application development, electronic design services, multimedia and embedded systems. It offers complete in-house creative and production capabilities-from concept development and script writing to programming, assembly and testing.

Transcorp International Limited offers foreign exchange services. The Company operates through Travels, Tours and allied activities segment. Its focus areas are money changing and money transfer (Inward Remittance). The Company offers a range of products, such as currency exchange, traveler's checks and travel cards, and caters to various segments of customers, such as leisure outbound travelers and business travelers from over 20 locations. It is an authorized dealer for money changing, which includes buying and selling of Foreign Exchange in retail, as well as wholesale to individuals and corporate clients and various permissible outward remittance activities, such as remittance for overseas education, medical treatment abroad, emigration and emigration consultancy fees. The Company operates in the segment of Inward Money Transfer as an agent of Western Union Financial Services and as per Mass Transit System (MTS) Scheme of Reserve Bank of India.

IKF Technologies Limited is engaged in providing services relating to information technology (IT), business process outsourcing (BPO) and software. The Company is also involved in telecom and project, and biofuels business. Its packaged application portfolio includes gamut of packaged application services, such as package evaluation, implementation, post implementation support and development, version upgrades and master data management services. It focuses on project planning, scheduling, scope/time/cost management, project tracking and project status reporting. The Company provides software testing, software maintenance, and configuration and change management solutions. Its Internet service provider (ISP) business focuses on research and development related to Internet services, voice over Internet protocol (VoIP) services and integration services. The Company has operations in South Africa, the United States and the United Arab Emirates.

Shalimar Wires Industries Limited is engaged in the business of providing synthetic forming fabric, metal fourdrinier wire cloth and EDM wire. The Company's segments include Paper Mill Product, and Strip & Wire. The Company's geographical segments include India, European Continent, African Continent, U.S.A., South American Continent and Other Asian Countries. Its paper mill product category includes forming fabric, such as single layer forming fabric, double layer forming fabric, three layer forming fabric, dryer screen (canvas), 1.5 layer forming fabric, 2.5 layer forming fabric and sheet support binder; metallic wire cloth, such as stainless steel and phosphor bronze, and dandy roll, such as dandy brackets, dandy cover, autoguide, cleaning system, watermarks and water filters. Its electrical discharge machining/non-ferrous (EDM/NF) wires product category includes Coated Edm Wires and Plain Edm Wires. The Company manufactures EDM Wires for the tool room industry.

Faze Three Autofab Limited, formerly Aunde Faze Three Autofab Limited, is an India-based company that offers automotive fabrics and seating systems. The Company is engaged in the manufacturing of specialized car seat fabric and offers its fabric products to original equipment manufacturers (OEMs). The Company's manufacturing plant is located at the Union territory of Dadra and Nagar Haveli.

KAMA Holdings Limited is a holding company. The Company's segments include Technical textiles business, Chemicals and Polymers business, and Packaging film business. The Technical textiles business segment includes nylon tire cord fabric, belting fabric, coated fabric, laminated fabric, polyester tire cord fabric and industrial yarns, and its research and development. The Chemicals and Polymers business segment includes refrigerant gases, chloromethane, pharmaceuticals, certified emissions reductions and allied products, engineering plastics business, and its research and development. The Packaging film business includes polyester films.
