Its subsidiaries include Shri Educare Limited, which provides education by setting up schools and pre-schools; KAMA Realty (Delhi) Limited, which owns commercial properties in Gurgaon and Mumbai, and SRF Transnational Holdings Limited, which is a non-banking financial company engaged in investments in securities of other companies.
Cella Space Ltd, formerly Sree Sakthi Paper Mills Limited, is an India-based warehouse company. The Company owns and operates logistic business, warehousing, cold storage and industrial parks.

Inditrade Capital Ltd is an India-based company that provides finance. The Company operates through four verticals: Agri-commodity Finance; Micro Finance; micro, small and medium enterprises (MSME) Finance; and Housing Finance. Agri-commodity financing vertical offerings include capital financing, warehousing receipt financing, commodities it lends against and auction services. Its working capital solutions include bill discounting, arbitrage financing, procurement financing, process financing and contract financing. It lends against various commodities, such as barley, cotton, jeera, rubber and wheat. Micro Finance vertical product offerings include micro housing loan, individual loan, income generation loan, emergency loan and education loan. It provides MSME loans ranging between 5 lakhs rupees to 25 lakhs rupees and is generally for a duration of 12 months.

Richa Industries Limited is an India-based manufacturing company operating in the pre-engineered building; engineering, procurement and construction (EPC), and textile sectors. The Company's segments include Manufacture in Textiles, and Manufacturer of Construction & Engineering (C&E) Division. The Manufacture in Textiles segment incorporates the product group, such as dyeing and processing of knitted fabrics and processing/knitting of yarn, and manufacture of Knitted fabric. The Manufacturer of C&E Division incorporates the product group, such as pre-fabricated steel building in complete knock-down (CKD) condition, tabular steel poles, structure and super structure for mining, drop rods, angles, shapes and section. The Company has approximately 30 circular knitting machines with capacity of over 260 tons per month. It has an installed capacity of approximately 900 tons of fabric per month. Its manufacturing unit for textile is in the city of Faridabad.

Saamya Biotech (India) Limited is an India-based biotechnology company. The Company's principal activity is trading of active pharmaceutical ingredients (API). The Company is engaged in the business of research and development of biotechnology products. The Company focuses on manufacturing and marketing of biopharmaceuticals and recombinant protein products of medical and industrial fields. The Company focuses on setting up of manufacturing facilities with an aggregate installed capacity of 342 kilograms per annum of bulk APIs of biopharmaceuticals. The Company also focuses on manufacturing Daunomycin, Hyaluronic acid (Pharma Grade), Tacrolimus, Rapamycin, Cyclosporin A, Probiotics, Lysergic Acid, Mycophenolic Acid, Clavulenic Acid, Vancomycin, Co-Enzyme Q10, Interferon B and Monoclonal Antibodies (anti-cancer). The Company intends to manufacture biopharmaceuticals in its plant located in Hyderabad, India.

Porwal Auto Components Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in automobile components manufacturing. The Company's products/services include CI & SG Iron Automobile Components. It manufactures a range of casted components and assemblies for the automobile industry. The Company is also an auto components supplier. The Company has a solar power generation unit located at Kakodiya Village, Tarana District, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh.

Sankhya Infotech Limited is a software products and services company. The Company operates through two segments Defense and Non-Defense. Its services include software services around the products, development of simulation software for specific customer needs, courseware, besides providing consulting support to customers. It offers products, such as SILICON suite, IRMAO and Sakai Collaborative Learning Environment (CLE). SILICON suite is an enterprise training platform that covers the entire spectrum of training in a paperless environment. SILICON Suite includes SILICON Training Management Information System (TMIS), SILICON Learning Management System (LMS), SILICON QT (Online Assessment System), and SILICON Learning Content Management System (LCMS). IRMAO is an integrated resource planning, management tracking system. Sakai CLE provides a range of features under categories, such as course management, assessment and grade book, collaboration, enterprise integration and scalability.

Aishwarya Technologies and Telecom Limited is a holding company. The Company is a designing and manufacturing company, which is engaged in producing test and measuring equipment, such as fiber, data and copper cable fault locators in India. The Company trades spectrum analyzers, vector network analyzers, signal generators, site analyzers, base transceiver station (BTS) testers, synchronous digital hierarchy (SDH) analyzers, splicing machines, optical time-domain reflectometers (OTDR's), cable fault locators, cable route locators and electronic markers and locating systems. It offers various products, including defense, education, manufacturing, projects and telecommunication products. The Company offers microwave subsystems, optical instruments, spectrum analyzer, optical test kits, microwave kits, oscilloscope, copper testers, data analyzers, splicing machines and other instruments. The Company exports its testers to Sri Lanka, Nepal, Bangladesh and the Middle East.

Niraj Cement Structurals Limited is engaged in execution of contracts of various infrastructure projects, including road work, bridge work and irrigation projects. The Company operates through road construction segment. The Company's services include rental, ready mix concrete unit (RMC), slip form paver and crushing unit. The Company's rental division provides all types of construction equipments on monthly rental basis, project specific basis, looking at the construction period and nature of works to be executed. The Company's RMC operates ready-mixed concrete plants in various part of cities and towns across the country. The Company's slip form paver has G and Z Slipform Paver Model S1000 Complete with all accessories, including central tie bar inserter and dowel bar inserter and TC800 texture/curing machine. The Company's crushing unit has approximately three modern crushing plants, capacity ranging 150 ton per hour to 200 ton per hour.

Vedavaag Systems Limited is engaged in providing information technology sales and services. The Company's business operations are divided into four verticals: e-governance solutions, knowledge center solutions and citizen service delivery platform management, new services e-integration. The e-governance solutions cover three business segments: local body management solutions, employment exchange solutions, and tourism and transport solutions. The knowledge center solutions provide infrastructure management solutions, content delivery management services and pre-employment training solutions. The citizen services delivery platform management provides its services through, ABHEE, which provides service at the door step. Its new services e-integration vertical offers private functional hall booking services, mobile retail mart and door delivery of e-governance services. Its subsidiaries include Vagdevi Sark Edutech Private Limited and Vedavag Common Service Centres Private Limited.

Bengal & Assam Company Limited is a holding company. The Company is a core investment company-non deposit taking-systemically important (CIC-ND-SI) registered with the Reserve Bank of India (RBI). The Company is a non-banking finance company, which is engaged in the business of investments and rent on properties. The Company's segments include Investment (shares/securities/funding), Polymer, Cotton Yarn and Fabric, and Dairy Products and others. The Company operates in the geographical segments, including Domestic and Overseas. The investments made by the Company in various shares/stocks/securities are primarily meant to be held over long term period. The Company's subsidiaries include J.K. Fenner (India) Limited, Southern Spinners and Processors Limited, Modern Cotton Yarn Spinners Limited, Acorn Engineering Limited, Divyashree Company Private Limited, Panchmahal Properties Limited and LVP Foods Private Limited, among others.

Essar Securities Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in the provision of consultancy services. The Company's segments include Consultancy and Advisory Services, and Investment Activities.

Coromandel Engineering Company Limited is engaged in the business of construction and property development. The Company's principal business activities include construction of buildings and construction of other civil engineering projects. It is engaged in the design of property development; construction of residential, commercial and industrial projects, and providing support services, such as electrical, mechanical and plumbing works. Its completed contract projects include Thermax-Meenakshi Energy Pvt. Ltd., Parryware Roca Private Limited, Tata Ryerson-Caterpillar Division, E.I.D. Parry, SV Sugar Mills, Ramco Cements, TNPL, Lear Automotives, Daimler India Commercial Vehicles Ltd., Minda Sai Ltd. and Komos Automotive Systems. Its commercial projects include Karumuttu Centre, Bombay Mutual Building, Trident Hotel, Alagappa University and Chinmaya Vidyalaya. Its completed residential projects include Coral Upavana, Coral Cascade, Benz Garden, Coral Crystal and Coral Castle.

Innovassynth Investments Limited is an India-based investment company. The Company invests in Innovassynth Technologies (India) Limited, which is engaged in the business areas of customs synthesis, contract research, contract and toll, and manufacturing of specialty chemicals. The Company has no operations. The Company has not generated any revenues.

Enkei Wheels (India) Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in the auto parts and equipment industry. The Company's operations include the manufacturing of aluminum alloy castings wheels mainly used in automobile industry in India. The Company has approximately two products, which include aluminum alloy wheels for two wheeler and aluminum alloy wheels for four wheeler. The Company's products are mainly used in utility vehicles and mid-size car segments. The Company's two wheeler products has an installed capacity of approximately 110,000 pressure control solenoid (pcs)/average (avg.) per month. Its four wheeler products has an installed capacity of approximately 80,000 pcs/avg. per month.

Fervent Synergies Limited is engaged in activities auxiliary to financial service activities, and other financial service activities. The Company lends short-term funds as and when available with the Company, for earning business income in line with continuation of business activities of its amalgamating companies.

Jointeca Education Solutions Ltd is an India-based software company, which provides education software solutions. The Company offers enterprise resource planning solutions for education and manufacturing sectors.

SRG Housing Finance Limited is a housing finance company. The Company is engaged in providing home loans for construction, additions, alterations, and repair and renovation purpose. The Company's Sparsh Home Loan is offered to individuals and corporate bodies for construction or purchase of a property. The Company's Home Revision Loan is offered to customers who repair, renovate, and extend the existing accommodation. The Company's Saral Plot Loans are offered to the salaried and the self-employed for outright purchase of plots for the construction of a house. Its Specialty Loan is offered for construction on land owned by borrower's parents. Its individual home loans include SRG Dream Home, SRG Construction Loan, SRG Home Revision Loan, SRG Plot Loans, SRG Home Loan for Self Employed and SRG NRI Housing Loan. Its loans against property include SRG Wealth Loan and SRG New Avenue Loan. Its builder's loans include SRG Builder's Construction Loan and SRG Land Development Loan.

Aditri Industries Limited, formerly Anshu's Clothing Limited, is an India-based company, which is engaged in the retail sale of readymade garments. The Company is involved in the made-ups of textiles. The Company operates Anshu's Designer Studio, which is a fashion house and designer boutique in Ahmedabad. The Company, through Anshu's Designer Studio, offers a range of products, which include Indian ethnic wear, Indian wedding saris, wedding bridal saris, evening wear, party wear and Indian designer wear. Its collection includes Designer Sarees, designer Salwar Kameez, Bridal Collection as Bridal Sarees and Bridal Lehnga, party wear lehenga and party wear sarees. The Company offers kids wear under the LOLIPOP brand. Its Kalamkari brand offers middle class to high class women's wear. The Company operates through brand outlets for trading of readymade garments.
Intellivate Capital Advisors Limited is engaged in offering consultancy and advisory services. The Company primarily operates in India.

Focus Industrial Resources Limited is a non-banking financial company (NBFC). The Company is engaged in the business of providing various types of loans and Investments. The Company's operates in Finance and investments segment. The Company's services are leasing, financing, hire purchase and investments. The Company's credit facilities are extended to different types of customers, which include individuals, partnership firms, companies and other legal entities.

India Finsec Limited is an India-based non-banking financial company (NBFC). The Company's principal activities include providing finance and dealing in shares and securities. The Company is engaged in the business of financing, inter corporate deposits, advancing short term loans, long term loans and credits to individuals and companies. The Company's segments include Trading in shares and securities, including trading in quoted equity shares, mutual funds, bonds, futures and option contracts, and Advancing of Loans. The Company also deals in stocks, shares and securities. The Company's financial services include unsecured loans, loans against property, personal loans, retail initial public offering (IPO) funding, inter corporate deposits, financial consultancy and management consultancy. The Company offers personal loans, funding against shares, and securities and long against property (LAP) to the individuals and body corporate. The Company's subsidiary is IFL Enterprises Limited.

Silverpoint Infratech Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in the trade of marketing and construction/civil work. The Company is engaged in land development and other related services for civil and structural construction and infrastructure sector projects. The Company offers its services for the civil and structural, construction and infrastructure sector projects. It has also carried out The Company offers services, such as land filling, leveling, shed foundation and road construction. The Company's subsidiaries include Baglamukhi Agencies Limited, Bhootnath Exports Limited, Kailashdham Mercantile Limited, Khatushyam Mercantile Limited, Pushapdham Commodities Limited, Panchpushap Vyapaar Limited, Ramrajya Tieup Limited, Shyambaba Business Limited, Shivprabhat Tradelink Limited, Roselife Vanijya Limited and Wellside Agencies Limited.

VKJ Infradevelopers Limited is an India-based company. The Company is engaged in the business of trading in construction materials, land development, civil construction, site development, land filing and fencing walls. The Company primarily trades soils and sands.

Satkar Finlease Limited is an India-based Non-Banking Financial Company (NBFC). The Company is focused on providing inter corporate loans, personal loans, loans against shares and securities, loans against properties, trade financing, bills discounting, trading in shares, and securities and arbitrage business in stock and commodity market. It is engaged in the business of hire-purchase finance, lease finance, bridge finance, deferred payment finance and/or to finance various kinds of purchasing, selling, hiring or letting on hire various kinds of plant and machinery, automotive vehicles, such as two-wheelers, vans and trucks, equipment, computers, consumer goods, articles, commodities and immoveable or moveable properties, including land and building. It undertakes and carries on the business of financial consultancy, and to act as advisors and/or consultants on all matters and problems in relation to diversification, rehabilitation or restructuring of various business concerns.

Stellar Capital Services Limited is an India-based non-banking financial company. The Company is mainly engaged in the business of providing loans and advances and investing in shares, both quoted and unquoted. The Company's segments are trading in share and securities, and advancing of loans. The trading in share and securities segment includes trading in quoted equity shares, mutual funds, bonds, futures and options, and currency. The Company's financial services include inter corporate deposits, financial consultancy, retail initial public offering (IPO) funding, loan against property, management consultancy, personal loans and unsecured loans.

Tentiwala Metal Products Limited, formerly Tentiwal Wire Products Limited, produces winding wires made of copper, which are used in the manufacture of both rotating and static electrical equipment. The Company manufactures submersible motor winding wire, enamel wire, paper covered strip/wire, aluminum extrusions, motor body, heat sinks, bus bars, polyvinyl chloride (PVC) wire and cable, low tension/high tension (LT/HT) cable and submersible flat cable. The Company's segments include Manufacturing and Trading. The Company operates in India.

Suyog Telematics Limited is an India-based telecommunication infrastructure provider. The Company provides telecommunication products and services and is engaged in the other machinery and equipment renting business. The Company is engaged primarily in the business of installing and commissioning of poles, towers and optical fiber cable (OFC) systems in India. The Company's services include fiber optic network solution, tower erection service, pole erection service and trading service. The Company provides infrastructure assets on a shared basis to wireless and other communications service providers. These customers use the space on its telecommunication towers to install communication-related equipment to operate their wireless communications networks. It also offers services to telecom operators in installing telecom infrastructure on job work basis.

Company: L P Naval and Engineering Ltd
Business Description: L.P. Naval and Engineering Limited, formerly Siddhi Vinayak Shipping Corporation Limited, is an India-based company engaged in the ship manufacturing business. The Company offers various services, such as ship repairs, ship building, high-speed aluminum boats, fiberglass yachts and boats, and general engineering. The Company also provides marine solutions. The Company is a part of Laxmipati Group of Companies (Laxmipati Group). The Laxmipati Group is engaged in the business of textile industry and power sector.

B.C. Power Controls Limited is engaged in manufacturing and trading activities. The Company manufactures and trades ferrous and non-ferrous metal items, which include wires and cables, and handcrafts. It is engaged in manufacturing insulated wires and cables; copper and copper products, and aluminum products. Its products include Flexible Cables, Armoured Cables, Telephone Cables, Unarmoured Cables, Submersible Cable, Instrumentation Cable and Shielded Cable. Its range of Flexible Cables includes Multicore Round polyvinyl chloride (PVC) Insulated Copper Conductor and PVC (Sheathed), Flexible Industrial Cables; Single Core PVC Insulated Copper Conductor (Unsheathed), Industrial Cables, and Single Core PVC Insulated, Stranded Copper Conductor (Unsheathed), Industrial Cables. It offers three core flat PVC Insulated Flexible Industrial Cable for submersible use. Its manufacturing unit is located at E-424, RIICO Industrial Area, Chopanki, Bhiwadi, Tehsil-Tijara, District-Alwar, Rajasthan.

Karnimata Cold Storage Limited is engaged in the business of warehousing of refrigerated (cold storage). The Company is involved in the business of providing cold storage facility on rental basis and providing loans to traders and farmers. The Company has a storage capacity of 25,500 million tons of potatoes. The Company's storage unit is located in the district of Paschim Medinipur of West Bengal.

Raunaq EPC International Limited (REIL) is engaged in providing pipeline and storage infrastructure solutions. The Company is a diversified company with two business segments: engineering, procurement and construction (EPC), and auto components. The Company's segments are Construction activity (civil, mechanical and engineering) and manufacturing of Automobile Components. It undertakes medium-sized projects for the core infrastructure and industrial sectors in India, including power, chemicals, oil and gas, petrochemicals, hydro-carbon, metal, cross country pipelines and automobiles. Its operational fields include industrial piping system, cross country pipeline and piping systems, storage tanks and oil handling systems, ash water recirculation systems, compressed air systems, fire water systems, and site fabrication and equipment erection works. Xlerate Driveline India Limited is its subsidiary, which is engaged in the manufacture of automotive clutches for commercial vehicles.

Gold Line International Finvest Limited is an India-based non-banking finance company. The Company is engaged in investment business. The Company is engaged in selling, buying, acquiring and holding of shares, debentures, bonds, stock and units. The Company is engaged in offering services, such as advancing loan against listed shares, securities and properties, and margin funding. The Company offers corporate loans and personal loans. The Company is engaged in trading in shares and securities, trade financing and bills discounting. The Company offers investment advisory services in India and abroad in order to undertake money market operations and treasury managements. It also acts as administration of different investment trusts. The Company also provides solutions for working capital financing. It provides loan against property to meet other financial and social commitments. It offers loan against shares to individuals and corporate.

Sharp Investments Limited is an India-based non-banking financial services company. The Company is engaged in the business of providing financial services. The Company is primarily focused in providing corporate loans, personal loans, loans against shares and securities, loans against properties and working capital loans. The Company is also engaged in arbitrage business in stock and commodity market and trades in shares and securities. The Company serves commercial, industrial and financial customers.

GCM Capital Advisors Limited is an India-based financial services company. The Company is primarily engaged in the business of providing financial advisory and consultancy services. The Company also provides integrated solutions to the clients, which includes managing aspects, such as merchant banking, including corporate finance, working capital finance, project finance and financial restructuring to corporate. The Company is also engaged in treasury operations by providing funding solutions to clients both in the form of debts and equity, and investment activities. As a part of treasury operations, the Company is also engaged in making investment in the form of equity in various companies. The Company invests in companies in a range of markets and stages.

Moneyboxx Finance Limited, formerly Dhanuka Commercial Limited, is an India-based non-banking financial company (NBFC). The principal business activities of the Company are providing unsecured loans and dealing in capital market. The Company is also engaged in the investing and trading in securities of other companies.

Capital Trade Links Limited is a non-deposit accepting non-banking financial company (NBFC), which offers a range of financial services for trade and industry. The Company is principally engaged in the business of advancing loans and financing. The Company offers credit facilities to individuals and business clients in low, medium and high range. The Company offers business loans, loans against property and fulfills working capital requirement, among others, of its individual, partnership firms, entrepreneurs, body corporate/business clients and other legal entities. The Company offers various products and services, which include venture capital, equity financing, personal loan and secured loan. The Company also provides advisory services to its investees. The Company generates funds from market financial resources.

Bansal Roofing Products Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in the business of manufacturing metal roofing sheets and accessories. The Company is engaged in trading, manufacturing, selling and supplying of color coated roof sheets, fiber-reinforced plastic (FRP) roof sheets, polycarbonate sheets, turbo ventilators and other miscellaneous roofing accessories. Its perforated metal sheets are used in ceilings, furnishings and interior design, among others. It offers miscellaneous products, such as polyvinyl chloride (PVC) curtains, PVC roof sheets and security cabins. Its FRP roof sheets are used in decorative false ceiling, skylight area and green house, among others. It offers polycarbonate sheets in a range of thicknesses and colors, as well as in flat sheets, embossed, corrugated and multiwall. Its other roofing accessories include base plates, clits, brazing rod and louvers.

Skipper Limited is an integrated transmission tower manufacturing company with angle rolling, tower, accessories and fastener manufacturing, and engineering, procurement and construction (EPC) line construction. The Company's main products/services include engineering products and polyvinyl chloride (PVC) products. The Company operates through three segments: Engineering Products, Infrastructure Projects and Polymer Products. The Engineering Products segment includes towers, angles, highmast poles, swaged poles and scaffoldings. The Infrastructure Projects segment includes horizontal direct drilling services, and engineering, procurement and construction services. The Polymer Products segment includes PVC, chlorinated polyvinyl chloride (CPVC), unplasticized Polyvinyl Chloride (UPVC), soil, waste and rain (SWR) pipes and fittings, and other related products. The Polymer Products segment has a manufacturing capacity of approximately 35,000 million tons per annum (MTPA).

Achal Investments Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in the business of financial activities. The Company is engaged in the business of financing, encouraging, promoting and assisting in the establishment and growth of industries and industrial undertakings. The Company focuses on Small Finance and works with low-income families to provide financial solutions. The Company is engaged in the business of providing term loan and working capital support to traders and medium sized enterprises. The Company also offers depository and stock broking services. It is engaged in acquiring, underwriting, holding, sell transferring, hypothecating and disposing of shares, stocks debentures, bonds, obligations and securities issued or guaranteed by any company constituted or carrying on business in India. It is engaged in borrowing or managing money with or without security and /or by issuing or selling bonds, mortgages, debentures and stocks of the company.

TTI Enterprise Limited is an India-based non deposit taking non-banking financial company (NBFC). The Company is engaged in the business of investment and finance. The Company is engaged in the business of providing loans, making investments in shares, mutual funds and other financial products. The Company provides finance on short-term and long-term basis. The Company's subsidiaries are Pratibhanu Mercantile Limited and Udyati Traders Limited.

Ultracab (India) Limited is engaged in manufacturing and exporting of wires and cables. The Company's products include Domestic Cables, International Cables and Special Cables. Its Domestic Cables include multi core flexible cables for industries, house wires/building wires, flat cables for submersible pumps, telephone cable and instrumentation cables. Its International Cables include auto cables, industrial cables and welding cables. Its Special Cables include super flat submersible cable for higher temperature, ultra triple protected (UTP) house wire-flame retardant (FR) and elevator cable. The Company also offers single core wires and multi core cables. Its cables and wires are used for lighting purpose both in commercial buildings and residential buildings. The Company sells its products in India, the United Kingdom, the United Arab Emirates, Africa, Singapore and Uganda. The Company's manufacturing facility is situated at Shapar (Rajkot, Gujarat) India.

Dhabriya Polywood Limited is an India-based manufacturer and supplier of extruded poly vinyl chloride (PVC) profile sections for various indoor furniture applications, such as doors, partitions, ceiling and paneling, and un-plasticized polyvinyl chloride (uPVC) windows/door systems. The Company's range of products includes PVC Doors, PVC Designer Doors, PVC Partition, UPVC Windows, UPVC Doors, Casement Windows, Office Workstations, Office Executive Chairs and Conference Table. Its range of UPVC Windows & Doors products include 48 Series Casement Windows, 95 Series Sliding Door & Window Systems, 55 Series Sliding Windows, 106 Series Polywood Casement Door Systems, 60 Series Casement Windows, 112 Series Sliding Door & Window Systems, 80 Series Sliding Windows, Arch Windows and 62 Series Sliding Door & Window Systems. Its range of PVC products includes PVC Plain Doors, Prefabricated Buildings, Security Walls, PVC Folding Doors, PVC False Ceiling, PVC Cable Ducts and PVC Wall Panelling.

Starlit Power Systems Limited is an India-based holding company. The Company is engaged in the manufacturing of automotive batteries, inverter batteries and solar batteries. The Company is also engaged in manufacturing and refining of lead. It focuses on various areas, including recycling, refining, manufacturing, trade, import and export of Lead-based products, such as Refined Lead with minimum 99.98% purity, Lead Alloys with Calcium, antimony, Selenium, Tin and Lead Oxides, such as Grey Oxide and Red lead. The Company also recycles old lead acid batteries and lead scrap. The Company's products include Refined Lead, Lead Sub-Oxide, Lead Alloy and Orange or Red Lead Oxide. The Company's manufacturing plant is located in Indri road, Atta Village, Sohna near Gurgaon, Haryana. The production capacity of its manufacturing plant is 12,000 metric tons. Vivaan Vyapaar Private Limited is the subsidiary of the Company.

Mudunuru Limited, formerly Green Field Agri Ventures Limited, is a technology-enabled information technology (IT) solutions company. The Company is engaged in the business of agriculture and Agriculture-based software development. The Company focuses on agriculture-related software and hardware solutions. The Company's segments include Dairy, Retail, Enterprise, Agriculture, Manufacturing and Software. The Company's subsidiaries include Mudunuru Software Limited and Mudunuru Dreams Private Limited.

Niyogin Fintech Limited, formerly M3 Global Finance Limited, is a non-deposit taking non-banking financial company (NBFC) in micro, small, and medium enterprises finance. The Company is engaged in loans, finance and investment activities.

Captain Pipes Limited is an India-based company engaged in the business of manufacturing and selling of unplasticized polyvinyl chloride (UPVC) pipes and fittings. The Company offers UPVC column pipes, UPVC plumbing pipes and fittings, Chlorinated polyvinyl chloride (CPVC) plumbing pipes and fittings, casing pipe and Polyvinyl chloride pressure pipes for irrigation. The Company's UPVC column pipes are available in multi grades, such as tiny, medium deluxe plus, medium, standard deluxe, standard deluxe plus, standard, heavy and super heavy. Its UPVC column pipe accessories include pump adapter, pipe adapter, stainless steel rod, mils steel flange, mild steel clamp and polyvinyl chloride (PVC) column pipe pump guard. Its UPVC plumbing fittings include coupler, tee, end cap, brass tee, brass elbow, PVC male adaptor (threaded), PVC male adaptor brass threaded, PVC ball valve, PVC reducing tee and tank adaptor. The Company has a production capacity of 17,700 metric tons per annum.

Anubhav Infrastructure Limited is a construction and engineering company. The Company is engaged in providing land development, construction services and other related services for civil and structural construction, and infrastructure sector projects. The Company provides services through its third-party vendor contractors to whom it subcontracts construction and other execution work related to projects. The Company's subsidiaries include Brijdhan Barter Limited, Dhanvivek Mercantile Limited, Everlasting Barter Limited, Gajmurti Suppliers Limited, Goodgain Sales Limited, Highreturn Business Limited, Highreturn Marketing Limited, Jalnayan Merchandise Limited, Kanakmay Vinimay Limited, Linkplan Suppliers Limited, Makelife Barter Limited, Manimaya Business Limited, Meantime Business Limited, Moontree Business Limited, Nirmalkunj Marketing Limited, Rashdhara Traders Limited, Riserose Marketing Limited, Sataywan Commodities Limited and Moonlike Merchandise Limited.

Meenakshi Enterprises Limited is an India-based non-banking finance company (NBFC). The Company's business is divided into NBFC Activity (Non-Deposit Taking Company), and Investment/Trading in Shares and Securities segments. The Company is also in to business of lending money or providing loans to both corporate clients and high net worth individuals. The Company also finances small and medium-sized enterprise (SME) sector for growth and it acts as consultant to the organizations for raising funds, including capital either through initial public offering or private equity/venture funds. The Company also acts as management consultant relating to areas, such as merger, amalgamation, acquisition and valuation. The Company invests its idle fund in both cash and derivatives market through Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE)/National Stock Exchange (NSE).

Kanchi Karpooram Limited (KKL) is an India-based company, which produces Terpene and paper chemicals. The Company manufactures a range of products from turpentine-based chemicals, such as camphor, dipentine, isobornyl acetate, and sodium acetate trihydrate. The Company also produces gum rosin and its derivates, such as fortified rosin, ester gum, phenolic and maleic resins.

Karnavati Finance Limited is an India-based non-banking finance company. The Company is engaged in the business of finance charges. The Company is mainly involved in business loans and personal loans. The Company's loan products are classified as business loan and personal finance. The Company's products are typically directed at individuals and small and medium size entities.

Talbros Engineering Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in the manufacture of axle shafts for automobile companies in India and foreign markets. The Company offers rear axle shafts and front axle shafts. The Company operates manufacturing and testing facilities. Its manufacturing facilities include forging and induction hardening. The Company has its manufacturing plants at Faridabad and Palwal.

Neil Industries Limited is a non-banking finance company (NBFC). The Company's business activities include shares and commodity trading, as well as providing financial services (except pension and insurance funding activities). The Company's product range include loans for business or capacity expansion, working capital loans, loans for purchase of equipment and machinery, term loans against property and loans for purchase of commercial property. The Company's portfolio of services include asset financing, promoter funding, stressed assets funding and margin financing. The Company also provides small and medium enterprises (SME) loans. Its SME loans include working capital loans, purchase of equipment and machinery loan, business or capacity expansion plan and term loans against property. It offers a range of financial, project development and management services. It has partnerships with various banks and financial institutions for asset collateral management and securitization.

Paul Merchants Limited (PML) is engaged in international inward remittance, foreign exchange and tours, and travels and air ticketing. The Company's segments include Forex, Western Union, Travel and Others. PML sells American Express (AMEX) Travelers checks in India and it offers foreign exchange services. The Company is a principal agent of Western Union Financial Services Inc. for the inward money transfer services. It offers a portfolio of tourism products, including cruises, medical, wellness, sports, eco-tourism, and film, rural and religious tourism. Its travel services also include hotel accommodation, buses, outbound tours, inbound tours, holiday packages and travel insurance. The Company offers business payment solutions, including inward and outward. The Company offers online reservations of air tickets and hotels through its domains, www.pmlholidays.com (business-to-business (B2B) site) and www.travelyatra.in (business-to-consumer (B2C) site).

Authum Investment & Infrastructure Limited, formerly Pentium Investments and Infrastructures Limited, is an India-based non-banking finance company (NBFC). The Company is engaged in other financial service activities, except insurance and pension funding activities. The Company operates through lending, trading and investing in securities. The Company's principal business is acquisition of securities. The Company is engaged in the fund-based activities, providing loans and advances, and investment in shares and securities.

POCL Enterprises Limited is an India-based company engaged in manufacturing of inorganic chemicals and base metals. The Company is engaged in the manufacture of lead, zinc and tin products and alloys. The Company specializes in manufacturing and trading of various metals, chemicals and their oxides. The Company offers lead oxides, zinc oxide, and lead metal and alloys. The Company also offers stearate, phthalate, di basic lead (DBL) phosphite and polyvinyl chloride (PVC) compound. The Company’s segments include Metal, Metallic Oxides, Plastic Additives and Others. The Company has manufacturing units in Puducherry, Kakkalur-Thiruvallur, Maraimalai Nagar, Tamilnadu, India. The Company manufactures PVC stabilizers, which is applicable in rigid polyvinyl chloride (RPVC) pipes, fittings profiles, cable insulations, PVC compounds and footwear. The Company’s products are also used in varistors, thermal papers, electroplating and dietary supplement in animal feed.

Amba Enterprises Limited is an India-based power engineering solutions company. The Company is engaged in the manufacturing of transformers cores and lamination, and stamping for rotating machines. The Company imports and manufactures silicon steel electrical lamination. The Company manufactures products from both materials of Cold Rolled Grain Oriented (CRGO) Steel and Cold Rolled Non Grain Oriented (CRNGO) Steel. Products from CRGO material include mitred lamination production and rectangular strips lamination production. Products from CRNGO material includes strips lamination, and all types of engineering and installation (E and I) lamination production of various types and ranges. The Company has a production capacity of approximately 3,000 metric tons per annum. The Company has testing equipment for testing the raw material to finished goods, and for testing and measuring the accuracy of press tools and dies.

Ambition Mica Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in manufacturing of decorative laminates and door skins. The Company's products include 1 MM Laminate and 0.8 MM Laminate. The Company's 1 MM Laminate products include Antique (24 C), Antique Aurum, Art Lam, Colourcore and Natural Wood. Its .8 MM Laminate products include Lam Art. The Company's subsidiary is Velsons Laminate Private Limited, which is engaged in manufacturing of laminates used in commercial segment. The Company distributes its products in various locations, which include Ahmedabad, Mahesana, Rajkot, Himmatnagar, Surat, Indore, Udaipur, Haryana, Nagpur, Kanpur, Hisar, Aurangabad, Pune, Nashik, Chennai, Jaipur and Punjab.

Majestic Research Services and Solutions Limited is an India-based market research agency. The Company offers a range of qualitative and quantitative research services both nationally and internationally. The Company's segments include Domestic and Export. It offers a suite of customized solutions that cater to business at various stages of product development or launch cross the product life cycle. The Company focuses on market research, advertising research, brand research and consumer research and also offers a range of other research services to assist companies in developing products and brands. Its research service offerings include market scoping, new product development and testing, brand communication, tracking and monitoring, and mobile and real-time data analytics. It serves various sectors, which include healthcare, fast-moving consumer goods (FMCG), pharmaceutical, information technology, media, aviation, automobile, banking and government.

Amrapali Fincap Limited, formerly Amrapali Fincap Private Limited, is engaged in the business of interest income. The Company is engaged in providing loan and advances. The Company's loan and advances are provided to parties, which are related to the promoter or associate concern of promoters. The Company provides unsecured short-term loans to its customers. The Company is also engaged in the business of trading in commodity and shares. The Company is trading in shares of listed entities, silver, gold and agricultural products.

Universal Autofoundry Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in manufacturing of cast iron casting. The Company manufactures castings components in Grey Iron and S.G. (Ductile) Iron, primarily for automotive sector. It supplies castings in machined, semi machined and as cast condition with surface treatment as per customer's need. For commercial vehicles, the Company supplies suspension and engine mounting brackets, engine bearing caps block, differential cases, fly wheels, wheel hubs and pulleys. For the tractor industry, it offers lift arms, differential cases, cylinders, adaptor plates, brake and control housing, and rocker and other brackets. For passenger cars, it offers pulleys. For the earth movers industry, it offers brake drum casting. For the construction industry, it offers anchor body. The Company mainly caters to requirement of commercial vehicle segment of the automotive industry and tractor segment.

Arambhan Hospitality Services Limited, formerly Cawasji Behramji Catering Limited, is an India-based company, which is engaged in catering business. The Company is in the business of offshore and onshore catering services. The Company's segments are restaurant and catering. The Company's services include offshore catering and housekeeping, banquets and catering, restaurants and gymkhanas. The Company's offshore catering menu includes rigs, multipurpose offshore support vessels, platforms, dive support vessels, construction, seismography, pipe-laying and accommodation barges, and geological survey vessels. The Company operates restaurants under the brand name Mesohappi and Captain's Table at Bandra. It also operates Quick Service Restaurant format. CBCS International Limited is the subsidiary of the Company.

Acewin Agriteck Ltd, formerly OFS Technologies Limited, is an India-based company focused on shrimp cultivation and hatchery business. The Company also seeks to focus of fruits and vegetable farming with green house farming.

BFL Asset Finvest Ltd is a India-based non-banking finance company. The Company invests and trades in securities, negotiable instruments and deals in futures and options. The Company is also engaged in investment activities and offers inter corporate loans.

Relicab Cable Manufacturing Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in the business of manufacturing and marketing of polyvinyl chloride (PVC) compounds, and wires and cables. The Company manufactures wires and cables to provide solutions for various electrical connectivity requirements, mainly for the industrial segments. Its product range includes a range of wires and cables, including armored/unarmored and single core, as well as multi core flexible cables, control and power cables and instrumentation cables. It is involved in manufacturing a range of wires and cables that are used in diverse sectors, such as telecom, electrical, automotive and household appliances and the new field of wind energy. The Company supplies its products under the brand name, Relicab. Its products are exported to countries, such as Russia, Uganda, Indonesia, Nigeria, Singapore and the United Arab Emirates. Its manufacturing facility is located at Daman (Union Territory).

Ruby Cables Limited is engaged in the manufacturing of various types of polyvinyl chloride/cross-linked polyethylene (PVC/XLPE) insulated low temperature (LT) Wires and Cables, under the brand name RUCAB. The Company also manufactures all aluminum conductors (AAC), all aluminum alloy conductors (AAAC), aluminum conductor steel reinforced (ACSR) Conductors and Aerial Bunch Cables. The Company offers various cables, which include armored cables with copper/aluminum conductor, unarmored power cables with copper/aluminum conductor, flat cables, PVC 3 core round cables, PVC 4 core round cables, copper braided control cable and aerial bunched cables. It also offers PVC insulated multi straned copper conductor (house wires). Its AAAC is made out of aluminum-magnesium-silicon alloy. Its AAC are used in low, medium and high voltage overhead lines. Its ACSR is a concentrically stranded conductor with one or more layers of hard drawn 1350-H19 aluminum wire on galvanized steel wire core.

Franklin Leasing and Finance Limited is an India-based non-deposit taking non-banking financial company (NBFC). The Company is engaged primarily in the business of advancing loans and investing/trading in securities. The Company offers various financial services, such as inter corporate deposits, loans against property, personal loans and unsecured loans.

Sysco Industries Limited is engaged in manufacturing and trading of metalized film, coated film, metallic yarn, imitation jari badla and printed laminate for flexible packaging. The Company's products include metallized paper, metallized biaxially oriented polypropylene (BOPP) filmed, metallized cast polypropylene (CPP) films, metallized polyester, metalized polyester coated on one side other side plain, metalized polyester high slip coated on both side, metalized polyester release coated on one side, metalized polyester release coated on both side, metalized polyester film matte coated on one side or both side, M type (flat film yarn (unsupported)), MS type (flat yarns for weight production process with caustic soda), MX type (supported yarn), MH type (twisted yarn), stand up pouches, side gusset bags, quad seal bags and spout pouches. Its products are supplied to entities engaged in the textiles, fast-moving consumer goods (FMCG), pharmaceuticals and food sector, among others.

RSD Finance Limited is an India-based non-banking company (NBFC). The Company is focused on investing activities, job work activities and real estate business. It operates through three segments: financial service, job work and hotel segment. It is primarily focused into investing activities such as Deals or transactions involving sale or purchase of equipment, plants, properties, securities, or other assets generally not held for immediate resale. In the job work segment, it is engaged in zinc plating business. The Company’s subsidiaries include Precision Automotive Private Limited and SRP Oil Private Limited. The Company, through Precision Automotive Private Limited, is engaged in manufacturing, buying and re-selling of auto components. It is engaged in the business of hotel industries under the brand the hotel Alcor.

Madhav Infra Projects Limited is an India-based company, which is engaged in the business of construction of infrastructure projects. The Company operates in three segments: Civil & EPC Contract, Trading and Solar Power Generation. The Company's energy business includes a project pipeline of solar and hydro power projects. The Company's solar photo-voltaic (SPV) power projects are located in Karnataka, Gujarat and Punjab. It undertakes infrastructure contracts for industrial construction, road work and build-operate-transfer (BOT) projects. It is also engaged in the business of real estate or townships. The Company's subsidiaries are involved in the business of developing the infrastructure in the state of Madhya Pradesh in India. Its subsidiaries include Madhav Infracon (BK Corridor) Private Limited, Madhav (Sehora Silodi Corridor) Highways Private Limited, MI Solar (I) Private Limited and Madhav Industrial Park Private Limited.

Advance Syntax Limited is an India-based manufacturer of other made up textile goods except apparel. The Company is into manufacturing business of metallic yarn and precision cut glitter powder for various applications, such as textile printing, molding, and flocking over and above conventional decorative application. It supplies metalized and coated polyester film for manufacturing metallic yarn, and glitter powder.

Hindusthan Urban Infrastructure Limited is a manufacturer of electronic components and non-metallic mineral products. The Company is also engaged in electric power generation, transmission and distribution business. The Company's segments include Conductor & Cable, and Insulators. The Company's product portfolio includes cables, conductors and insulators. Its offerings in cables include Extra High Voltage (EHV) Cables up to 132 kilovolts (kV); High Tension (HT) Power Cables up to 33 kV; Mining Cables for 3.3 kV/6.6 kV voltage grade, and all other cables application cables as per customer requirement. Its offerings in conductors include All Aluminium Alloy Conductors (AAAC) up to 800 kV lines; Aluminium Alloy Conductors Steel Reinforced (AACSR) up to 800 kV lines, and Poly Vinyl Chloride (PVC)/Cross Link Poly Ethylene (XLPE) Insulated Conductors for Overhead application. Its offerings in insulators include Hollow Insulators (Single piece with taper bore) and Line post insulators.

Mitsu Chem Plast Ltd. is a manufacturer of plastic blow molded and injection molded products. The Company manufactures a range of products in the blow molding, injection molding and also customized molding (combination of processes). The Company's products are categorized as Molded Industrial Packaging, Healthcare Furniture, Automotive Components and Infrastructural Furniture. Under Molded Industrial Packaging, it offers full open top drum, jerry cans, narrow mouth drums, wide mouth drums/jars, big range of small containers, injection molded solutions and sports merchandise. Under Healthcare Furniture, it offers Curved Head and Leg Bow, Plastic Straight Head and Foot Bow, Plastic Rod, Plastic Buffers, Plastic Toilet Seat, Plastic Food Table Board, Side Railing with Bracket and Head Immobilizer. Under Infrastructural Furniture, it offers Plastic Chair Shells, Plastic Seat Shells, Plastic Stadium Seat, Plastic Chair Seats, Plastic Chair Parts and Plastic Baby Car Seat Shell.

Radhika Jeweltech Limited, formerly Radhika Jewellers, is a jewelry retailer. The Company sells gold jewelry and diamond studded jewelry. The Company designs and manufactures its products either in house or by third parties on job work basis. Its product profile includes traditional, bridal contemporary and combination designs across jewelry lines, usages and price points. It procures raw gold and diamond from its suppliers on cash basis and then it designs the gold jewelry through its job workers and displays the product for sale in its showroom. It is also engaged in trading of branded jewelry. Its showroom is located at Rajkot, India. The Company also offers precious and semi-precious stone studded jewelry, gold coins, gold bullion and loose diamond solitaires. It provides daily wear jewelry, jewelry for personal occasions, festival jewelry and wedding jewelry. It offers a range of jewelry options, including rings, earrings, pendants, bracelets, necklaces, chains and bangles.

Sagarsoft (India) Limited is an India-based provider of business information technology (IT) services, consulting, technology and generation services. The principal business activity of the Company is software development and consultancy services. The Company's geographic segments include Exports and Domestic. The Company offers various solutions, such as mobile competency, enterprise Web applications, testing and quality assurance, analytic and business intelligence, and workforce solutions. Its methodology includes domain expertise, execution models, engagements models and delivery models. Its execution models includes agile execution approach, rapid prototype approach, waterfall model, Kanban methodology and V-model. Its delivery models include onsite and offshore. It is engaged in delivering critical applications targeted at Retail, Pharmaceutical, Entertainment, Utilities, Digital Marketing, Financial Services, E-Commerce, Information Technology and Insurance.

DRA Consultants Limited, formerly DRA Consultants Private Limited, is engaged in the business of engineering consultancy in India. The Company is a technical service provider for conducting municipal/ industrial/ building water audits. The Company’s segments include Project Management Consultancy, Public-Private-Partnership Consultancy, and Technical and Transaction Advisory Services. It is engaged in providing water supply, wastewater treatment and water monitoring, and provides technical, commercial, legal and financial advisory services across sectors, including setting up sustainable water and waste water tariff, and bylaws for Urban Local Bodies/Boards. It is involved in preparation of master plans, feasibility report, investment planning, procurement, bid preparation, bid process management, quality assurance plan, project schedules, commissioning, trail runs and performance monitoring, among others. It has experience in industrial utilities and urban infrastructure projects.

Valiant Organics Limited, formerly Valiant Organics Private Limited, is a chemical manufacturing company. The Company focuses on manufacturing and marketing of various types of chlorophenol, which is a chemical and has various applications, including agro-chemical industry, pharmaceutical industry, dyes industry, manufacturing of cosmetics and veterinary drugs. The Company's segment is engaged in Pharmaceutical business. The Company manufactures Chlorophenols, namely, OrthoChlorophenol, ParaChlorophenol and di-chlorophenols, namely, 2,4 Di-chlorophenol and 2,6 Di-chlorophenol. The Company focuses on developing in-house process technology to expand its product range, including chloro phenols, which is used as intermediates in pharmaceuticals, pesticides, disinfectants, anti-bacterial and veterinary. The Company's manufacturing facility is located at Sarigam Industrial Estate, which has an installed capacity of approximately 4,800 metric tons per annum.

Shashijit Infraprojects Limited, formerly Shashijit Construction Private Limited, is an India-based industrial and infrastructural contracting company. The Company constructs, builds and develops industrial infrastructure facilities, driveways, public utilities, powerhouse buildings, factories and such other immovable properties. The Company is engaged in building and developing residential and commercial complexes, and turnkey industrial projects. The Company offers services in general contracting, pre-construction management and turnkey development. The Company is focused on civil construction for industrial and residential projects, power plants and power service stations, among others. The Company has executed various industrial and residential projects in Gujarat primarily in Vapi, Silvassa, Surat and Union Territory Daman.

Chemcrux Enterprises Ltd is a manufacturer of intermediates for bulk drugs, and dyes and pigments. The Company's products include 2 Chloro Benzoic Acid; 3 Chloro Benzoic Acid; 4 Chloro Benzoic Acid; 4 Nitro Benzoic Acid; 2,4 Dichloro Benzoic Acid; 4 Chloro 3 Nitro Benzoic Acid; 2 Chloro 5 Nitro Benzoic Acid; Meta Nitro Benzoic Acid; Lassamide, and Meta Chloro Per Benzoic Acid. The Company also offers various products on custom requirements, including Aceturic Acid; Meta Chloro Benzoyl Chloride; 3-Nitro-4-Methoxy Benzoic Acid; 2 Amino 5 Sulfonamide Benzoic Acid; 3,4 Dichloro Benzoic Acid; 5-Nitro Salycylic Acid, and 4-Chloro Benzoic Acid -3-Sulfonamide. The Company's plant has a capacity of 120 metric tons per month. The Company exports to Europe, Japan, the Middle East and East Africa. It is engaged in development and execution of various processes, such as High Pressure Oxidation, Nitration and Chloro Sulfonation.

Prime Fresh Ltd, formerly Prime Customer Services Limited, is a multi-services customer focused organization, which offers value added services to a whole range of clients spread across various business segments. The Company is engaged in the business of providing services, including warehousing solutions, cold storage and ripening solutions, manpower solutions and packaging solutions. Its end-to-end warehouse solutions and services include maintaining records, unloading, storage and loading. Its packing solutions include sorting, grading, bar coding and packing into specific quantity as per the directions of the principal/customer. It provides skilled, semi-skilled and unskilled laborers to its customers on contract basis. It operates cold storage and ripening chambers for fruits, vegetables, flowers and frozen food items. Its unit has warehouse, cold storage-cum-ripening rooms, deep freeze rooms, processing and packing hall and dispatch facility.

Octaware Technologies Limited is an India-based offshore outsourcing company. The Company is engaged in the business of developing, designing and servicing computer software and information technology related applications and systems. It is engaged in Web, e-commerce, applications and systems development, as well as in Microsoft platform services and database management systems. It offers a range of services, including software development services, enterprise portal, enterprise resource planning (ERP) and customer relationship management (CRM) implementation, consulting services, mobile solutions, radio-frequency identification (RFID) solutions, cloud and information technology infrastructure services, and geospatial services. Its offerings include PowerERM-Employee Relationship Management, Hospice-Healthcare Solution and iOnAsset-Asset Tracking & Management System. It serves various industries, such as healthcare, education, government, oil and gas, and manufacturing.

Riddhi Corporate Services Limited is engaged in providing support to business needs of telecom, banking, non-banking finance sector (NBFC) and information technology(IT) sectors. The Company’s services include documents management, warehousing, contact center, documents digitalization, data entry, Web/data enabled services, software development and address verification. Document management service includes extracting the data, collating the information, converting the paper data, formatting the data to proper structure, and transferring the data to centralized platform. Warehousing provides inventory management services. Software development includes customized content management system (CMS) development, re-engineering applications development, custom software development, software consulting services, customized data warehouse solutions development, customized Website designing and development solutions and customized enterprise application integration.

7NR Retail Limited is engaged in the business of branding and selling of readymade garments under the brand name Gini and Jony Limited. The Company sells kids garments. The Company’s offering include a range of products from basics to western style of clothes in a variety of sizes, colors and styles to fit. The Company operates through two segments namely retail and wholesale segment. Retail segment is engaged in trading in kids garments in the retail segment by retailing of brand Gini & Jony. Wholesale segment is engaged in wholesale trade of suiting shirting, other textile products, trading in the kids garments which includes all types of uniforms and other fabrics on wholesale basis. The Company operates approximately four retail stores exclusively for kids apparel brand Gini & Jony across the state of Gujarat.

Jigar Cables Limited is engaged in manufacturing of electric wires and cables wires in India. The Company manufactures power and control cables, house wires/ building wires and flat cables under the brand name SIGMA. The Company offers a range of products, including low tension (LT) power cables and control cables, submersibile flat cables, safe home wires and arial bunch cables. Submersibile flat cables can be used for applications, such as drinking water pump and offshore drilling rings. LT power control cables can be used industries, including power plants, projects and other electrical systems. Arial bunched cables are used for over head power distribution in congested urban areas with narrow lanes and by-lanes. Safe home house wires can be used in commercial and residential buildings. The Company also offers a range of flexible copper cables for applications, such as panels and motor pumps.

GlobalSpace Technologies Limited is an information and communication technology (ICT) company. The Company is primarily engaged in providing technology-enabled business enhancement solutions. The Company is engaged in providing integrated software product platforms and solutions to enable large and medium enterprises embrace mobility and digital technology for their business enhancement. The Company provides domain specific mobility and digital technology products. The Company offers vertical specific technology solutions in Pharma Domain, such as GloDIGITALL, MedsApp, GloCONSULT, GloKIOSK and GloDNH (small-size healthcare technology management solution); in Banking, Finance Services and Insurance (BFSI) Domain, such as GloFIN and GloKIOSK-Speed banking, and in Education Domain, such as GloKIOSK-Student Engagement Framework and GloRE. Apart from the software product platforms, the Company has designed and built enterprise specific tablet personal computers/computing device brands.

Shish Industries Limited is an India-based company engaged in manufacturing plastic twin wall and multi wall corrugated sheets. The Company also manufactures variety of products, including polypropylene (PP) corrugated plastic rolls, which is an extruded fluted PP corrugated plastic sheets consisting of two or multi flat walls connected by vertical ribs. It exports its products to various countries, such as United Arab Emirates, Myanmar and Oman. Its plastic corrugated sheets are used in various industries and application, including construction building, humanitarian relief, signage board, pet enclosures packaging, hobby applications, medical, and advertisement. Its product range includes Stagguard, Saffguard, Roof Board, Glass Tick, Addcor, Corrbox, Pp Roll, Customised Product - Pp Box, and stationary products.

Mehai Technology Limited is an India-based company engaged in manufacturing light-emitting diode (LED) bulbs and fixtures. The Company also manufactures moon light bulbs, tube lights, pendrive and power banks. Its products include Mehai T5-one Foot 5 watts (W) Led Tube Light Cool White, Mehai T5-one Foot 5W Led Tube Light Warm White, Mehai T5-one Foot 5W Led Tube Light Blue, Mehai T5-one Foot 5W Led Tube Light Green, Mehai T5-one Foot 5W Led Tube Light Pink, Mehai T5- one Foot 5W Led Tube Light Red, Mehai T5- two Feet 12W Led Tube Light Cool White, Mehai T5-two Feet 12W Led Tube Light Warm White, Mehai T5-two Feet 12W Led Tube Light Blue, Mehai T5- two Feet 12W Led Tube Light Green, Mehai T5- two Feet 12W Led Tube Light Blue, Mehai T5- two Feet 12W Led Tube Light Green, Mehai 0.5W Led Night Lamps, Mehai USB Pen Drives and Mehai Power Banks.

IRIS Business Services Limited, formerly IRIS Business Services Pvt., Ltd, is an India-based provider of software products for compliance, data and analytics. The Company operates through three segments: Collect Create and Consume. The Create segment offers a range of products from enterprise software to Cloud / software as a service (SAAS). The Create segment offers software to help the regulated entities create data for submission to regulators. The Consume segment offers Data-as-a-Service (DaaS). Its IRIS iFILE is an end to end electronic filing framework comprising several modular components. Its IRIS CARBON is a cloud-based, collaborative filing platform that addresses reporting needs of an enterprise. IRIS iDEAL is an eXtensible Business Reporting Language (XBRL) reporting solution. Its Data Consumption Platform is its DaaS offering that is a repository of structured data culled from XBRL filings submitted by companies to securities markets regulators and company registries.

Kaarya Facilities and Services Limited is an India-based integrated facilities and property management company. The Company’s products and services include property management/facilities management, engineering services and specialized services. Its property management/facilities management services include end to end management of real estate assets, facilities/property operations and maintenance, on site facility management/property management team. Its engineering services include electro-mechanical operations and maintenance, electrical, plumbing systems and fire alarm and safety service. Its specialized services include housekeeping, specialized cleaning, pest control, facade, gardening, workplace solutions, reception, mail, help desk, offices help, and floor assistants services. It serves various sectors, such as corporate, small and medium enterprises (SMEs), Government institutions and residential sectors.

Sharika Enterprises Limited is an India-based power transmission and distribution engineering procurement construction (EPC) company. The Company is engaged in engineering procurement construction (EPC) contracts, specialized assembling, trading activities and erection services. The Company’s portfolio includes installing power transmission extra high voltage (EHV) cables, designing and installing energy management system (EMS) and allied distribution automation equipments, such as autoreclosers, fault passage indicators (FPI), designing and installing of solar power generation plants. It also provides consultancy and project management in field of power generation, transmission and distribution. The Company is also engaged in trading of light-emitting diode (LED) lights and accessories, power capacitors, switchgears and cast resin transformers.

Dynamic Cables Ltd is an India-based company that is engaged in manufacturing of cables and conductors. The Company’s products include Low Voltage (LV) & Medium Voltage (MV) Aerial Bunched Cable, Low Tension (LT) & Polyvinyl Chloride (PVC) & Cross linked poly Ethylene (XLPE) Control Cables, LV PVC and XLPE Power Cables, MV Power Cable, Solar Cable, LV PVC Service Cable, Mining Cable, Flat Cables for Submersible Pumps, Flexible Multi Core Cables, Aluminium Conductor Steel Reinforced Conductors (A.C.S.R.Conductors), All Aluminium Conductors (A.A.C) & All Aluminium Alloy Conductors (A.A.A.C.) and Insulated Conductor. The Company provides its services to the customers in various sectors, including industrial, exports, turnkey projects, power distribution companies and infrastructure works.

Rithwik Facility Management Services Limited is an India-based company. The Company is engaged in the business of integrated facilities, property management, and equipment and assets management. The Company is also engaged in the business of billing management, including building maintenance, energy invoices and managing collections. The Company's services include managing the security of the building, common area housekeeping, water supply system management, annual maintenance contract (AMC) of amenities, such as generators, chiller plants, air handling units (AHUs) and air conditioners.

Focus Suites Solutions & Services Limited is an India-based market research company. The Company provides fieldwork, panel research and primary data collection services. The Company's primary services include Qualitative Fieldwork, Sensorial Fieldwork, Usability Fieldwork, and Data Acquisition and Data Analysis. The Company offers various methods of data collection in Qualitative Fieldwork, including observations, textual or visual analysis, and interviews. It offers various Sensorial methods, which includes quantitative descriptive analysis, discrimination testing, time intensity testing, shelf life testing and rapid profiling. The Company's services for Usability Fieldwork include usability testing, reviews, experiments, ecosystem fieldwork, user centered design, innovation projects and detailed design. It serves the customers in various sectors, including healthcare, automobiles, information technology and telecommunications, fast moving consumer goods and retail.

Benara Bearings and Pistons Limited is an India-based company that manufactures and markets automobile parts. The Company under its brand name, markets products like ball bearings, spark plugs, rocker arms, connecting rods, valve guides, and valve seals and automobile batteries sourced from third-party contract manufacturers. The Company manufactures products, such as pistons, piston pins, piston rings, cylinder liners, engine valves, and engine bearings and bushes among others. It sells its products in the original equipment manufacturing and replacement markets. The Company's manufacturing facilities are located in Agra, Uttar Pradesh.

Taylormade Renewables Ltd develops solar thermal technology. The Company's objective is to provide Solar Thermal Parabolic Concentrators for various thermal applications using Parabolic Concentrators as a competitive, non-subsidized source of energy. The Company's strategy is to straddle multiple technology platforms and to drive scale to bring down the costs of the technology and make it affordable to consumers globally. The Company has various applications like cooking, heating, air-conditioning, process heat, producing steam, heating of thermic fluid for various applications, pressurized hot water and many more. The Company also manufactures biomass cook stoves, solar dryers, solar box cookers and solar dish cookers.

Dhruv Consultancy Services Limited is company engaged in providing infrastructure consultancy services to businesses. It provides various infrastructure services, such as designing, engineering, procurement, construction and integrated project management services for highways, bridges, tunnels, architectural, environmental engineering, and ports. It also provides various services, which include preparation of department of petroleum resources (DPR) and feasibility studies for infrastructure projects, operations & maintenance works, project management consultancy services, independent consultancy, project planning, designing, estimation, traffic and transportation engineering, financial analysis, technical audits, structural audit, inspection of bridges and techno-legal services.

U. H. Zaveri Limited is an India-based gems and jewelry company. The Company operates through two divisions: wholesale and retail of jewelry and trading of jewelry. It sells gold, silver and other kind of jewelry and utensils. Its showroom has a collection of antique, kundan, polka and temple jewelry. Its product portfolio includes gold and silver jewelry with or without studded precious, semi-precious stones with a range of earrings, neckpieces, armlets, bangles, anklets, bracelets, pendant sets, rings, nose studs and chains. It also provides fashion jewelry, casual custom jewelry and casual wear accessories. The Company sells its jewelry from its retail showroom located in Ahmedabad.

Innovators Facade Systems Limited is an India-based company engaged in the design, fabrication and installation of facade elements and systems. The Company provides its infrastructure services to airports, residential and other commercial projects. It designs and installs building exteriors that include curtain wall systems, structural glazing, semi unitized systems, unitized curtain walls, railings, skylight, and dry stone cladding among others. The Company’s production facility is located in Wada, Maharashtra.

Affordable Robotic & Automation Limited is an India-based company that provides turnkey automation solution to automotive, semi-automotive and manufacturing industries. The Company programs and automates the functions of machines used in manufacturing process of automobile industry. It is also engaged in the business of assembling and installing automatic multilevel car parking system. Its products include industrial automation, multi-level car parking and secondary packaging. It serves various industrial automation needs, such as line automation, assembly line, conveyor and robotic inspection stations. The Company’s subsidiary is ARAPL Intelligent Equipment Shanghai Co. Ltd.

Deep Polymer Ltd is a manufacturer of color and additive master-batches for engineering plastics and compounds. It manufactures color and additives , such as antifab fillers, transparent fillers and colour fillers. The manufacturing plant is located at Ahmedabad, and manufactures color master batches and filler master batches with a total production capacity of approximately 12,000 metric tons (MT) and 25,000 MT respectively.

BCPL Railway Infrastructure Limited is an India-based company engaged in the business of railway infrastructure development. The Company is focused on involving in design, drawing, supply, erection and commissioning of 25 kilovolts (KV), 50 hertz (Hz) single phase traction overhead equipment (OHE). Its services include 25 KV overhead electrification work, traction sub-station work, sub-sectioning work, switching post work, feeding post work, power supply installation work and modification of OHE work. It is focused on the electrification sector of the railways. Its projects include 25 KV OHE work from Kumedpur to Old Malda, 25 KV OHE work from Singapur to Damanjodi, and 25 KV OHE work from Khana to Sainthia to Pakur & Khana Pakur Traction Sub-Station.

Jonjua Overseas Limited is an India-based information technology (IT) enabled services company. The Company’s offered business services includes startup consultancy, import and export consultancy, international project finance, outsourcing of accounts, Website development, brand building, offsite legal research and support services, business plan writing and medical tourism solutions. Startup consultancy offers company registration, copyright, trademark registration, company secretarial, accounting services and legal research support. Import and export consultancy provides inquiry about the product being the subject matter of patent protection; inquiry about the product permissions and licenses, and research legal provisions related to public health, safety of product and fairness of trade. Outsourcing of accounts provides bookkeeping, accounting and allied services; payroll accounting; inventory accounting; cash flow and budgeting; accounts reconciliation, and tax return preparation.

Kranti Industries Limited is an India-based manufacturer and supplier of precision machined components. The Company manufactures various automotive components from over 100 millimeter (MM) to 1,200 MM. It manufactures products for original equipment manufacturers of diverse industries, such as passenger cars, two wheelers, tractors, construction machineries, railways, light vehicles and heavy trucks. Its products include differential housings, which includes various types of cases, such as single piece, split from top, split from center and split from bottom; axle components, including a range of axle components for agriculture tractors, construction and machineries; automotive components, which consist of a range of automotive components, including clutch housings, brackets and oil sump; other industries components, such as medical, marine, and alternate energy source, and prototyping components for the projects. It has two manufacturing units, which are located in Pune, Maharashtra.

Aartech Solonics Limited is an India-based company. The company is engaged in the manufacturing of electricity distribution and control apparatus electrical apparatus for switching or protecting electrical circuits. The Company is operating only in one segments namely manufacturing of power equipment. It offers switches, fuses, voltage limiters, surge suppressors and junction boxes. The Company also offers voltage exceeding 1000 volts; similar apparatus including relays and sockets. For a voltage not exceeding 1000 volts offers boards, panels, consoles, cabinets and other bases equipped with two or more of the above apparatus for electricity control or distribution of electricity including power capacitors.

Evans Electric Limited is an India-based company that is engaged in the business of repairing, re-winding and re-designing. The Company is also engaged in the inhouse manufacturing of replacement components of small, medium and large electric motors, generators and transformers. The Company serves various sectors including thermal, hydro, diesel, gas and nuclear electric power generation, petroleum refineries, chemicals and fertilizers, cement plants, steel plants, tyre manufacturing, sugar mills, oil and gas exploration, shipping, mining and railway traction. The Company also provides component replacing and on-site services for large electric motors, generators and transformers.

Artemis Electricals Limited is an India-based company. The Company is into the business of manufacturing and trading of light emitting diode (LED) lights and LED lighting accessories.
